text:
Hari terakhir kami menginap di sulis beach hotel...ini hotel yang tidak mencolok dari depan..terlihat sederhana tapi ternyata sempurna 

Kita datang langsung disuguhi satu gelas buah segar dan handuk dingin..sangat menyenangkan..proses chek in cepat,,sayang resipsionisny judes..ini saja 1 catatan di hotel ini.

Room sangat luass,,bersih,,nyaman sekali,,ada balkon luas yg nyaman.

Breakfast jenis masakanny unik2..cukup aneh di lidah saya tapi ttp lezat dan berkesan.

Pool di lantai atas luaass sekali,,air bersih dan area pool terawat.

Siang hari ketika kami pulang ada layanan antar ke bendara free..terimakasih sulis hotel..next time kami akan kembali lagi.
title: Hotel yang unik tapi sempurna

text:
Saya pilih hotel Sulis karena review yang bagus di Agoda, dan karena luas kamar yang besar serta ukuran kasur yg besar juga, karena saya bertiga dg anak saya yg berusia 12 tahun.
Sayang pengalaman saya merubah image saya terhadap hotel ini. 
Saya dikenakan biaya tambahan utk anak saya, karena resepsionis mengatakan wajib untuk pakai extra bed untuk anak di atas 9 th. Walaupun saya sudah jelaskan bahwa saya mau pakai existing bed, karena menurut saya itu cukup dan saya bersedia untuk bayar extra breakfast saja.
Namun tetap si resepsionis mewajibkan saya bayar dg harga yg menurut saya lumayan tinggi karena akhirnya total yg harus saya bayar sebesar hotel lain yang lebih bagus.
Hanya karena saya lalai mencantumkan anak saya saat reservasi di Agoda, saya harus bayar lebih. Padahal setelah saya coba2 lagi lakukan reservasi di Agoda untuk periode lain, dg jumlah tamu 2 adult dan 3 adult, ternyata hampir sama, hanya selisih 2 ribu!
Ini pelajaran mahal bagi saya, next time saya akan lebih hati2 untuk lakukan reservasi.
Dan untuk hotel ini, saya kira agar lebih toleran, tidak terlalu kaku. Meski kamar bagus, breakfast oke, namun karena pengalaman yang kurang menyenangkan saat check in membuat rusak semuanya.
title: Biaya tambahan untuk anak

owner_response.text:
Dear Nyonya LiemSiuLan,

Kami sangat berterima kasih sudah tinggal di hotel kami baru-baru ini. Detail review anda di Tripadvisor sangat berharga untuk kami dan untuk calon pelanggan kami mendatang.

ANAK TERMASUK ORANG
Tanpa mengurangi rasa hormat, sebetulnya kami sangat bingung pada sesama tamu domestik keluarga karena jumlah anak-anaknya sering tidak dicantumkan saat membuat booking hotel (tidak diperhitungkan sebagai orang). Padahal setiap membuat booking pesawat terbang, jumlah anak-anaknya pasti tidak pernah lupa untuk dicantumkan (diperhitungkan sebagai orang). Mungkin kita perlu belajar disiplin seperti halnya saat kita booking hotel di luar negeri atau sebaliknya orang luar negeri yang booking hotel di negeri kita.

Setiap hotel mempunyai aturan berbeda tentang umur maksimum anak yang diizinkan untuk tinggal di tempat tidur yang tersedia (bersama kedua orang tuanya tanpa bayar). Informasi hotel bahkan sudah menyebutkan jumlah maksimum orang yang diizinkan untuk setiap jenis kamarnya. Namun sungguh sangat disayangkan bila anak-anak sering tidak dianggap sebagai “orang” sehingga jumlah/total yang menginap melebihi kapasitas maksimum.

KEBIJAKAN ANAK DAN TEMPAT TIDUR TAMBAHAN
Peraturan hotel akan batas umur anak dan kapasitas maksimum orang untuk menginap di kamar jenis tertentu sudah dijelaskan dalam informasi di website resmi hotel dan di Agoda (online agent yang anda pakai sebagai sarana booking anda). Di website kami menyebutkan bahwa batas umur anak adalah 9 tahun. Agoda bahkan menyebutkan 2 tahun sebagai batas umur anak yang boleh menginap gratis menggunakan tempat tidur yang tersedia (peraturan ini tertera jelas di bagian INFORMASI PENTING mengenai KEBIJAKAN ANAK DAN TEMPAT TIDUR TAMBAHAN). Bila melebihi batas umur di atas, biaya tambahan pasti akan dikenakan untuk kamar anda. Biaya tambahan ini tidak akan berkurang walaupun anda memutuskan untuk tidak menggunakan extra bed. 

Perlu diingat bahwa jenis kamar yang anda pilih & bayar di Agoda hanya untuk 2 orang saja (jumlah anak bahkan anda cantumkan 0 dalam booking anda). Bilamana anda mencantumkan anak anda, harga kamar pasti akan berubah karena adanya biaya tambahan untuk orang ke-3 (dan seterusnya).

BEDA TANGGAL BEDA HARGA
Sebagai destinasi wisata, harga kamar hotel di Bali pasti lebih mahal di periode Liburan Lebaran (harga mencapai puncaknya di tanggal Idul Fitri). Ini tidak berbeda dengan pesawat terbang, harganya berbeda bila tanggal terbangnya berbeda walau destinasinya sama.

TOLERANSI
Sekali lagi tanpa mengurangi rasa hormat, toleransi gratis yang anda harapkan tidak bisa kami penuhi mengingat informasi resmi hotel dan Agoda sudah mencantumkan kebijakan & harganya dengan jelas (sebelum anda membuat keputusan final untuk booking di hotel kami). Dengan “kesalahan” yang sudah dibuat (sengaja atau lalai), hendaknya keputusan kami bisa disyukuri; karena dengan biaya tambahan, kami masih bisa tetap mengakomodasi anda sekeluarga (bersama anak anda yang tidak dicantumkan dalam booking). Resepsionis kami sebetulnya sudah memberikan toleransi untuk biaya tambahan orang ketiga ini berupa diskon dari harga aslinya di Agoda. Tapi sayang, anda masih belum merasa puas dengan upaya yang sudah kami tempuh: diskon + setup extra bed mendadak untuk kamar anda.

Hormat kami,

Paulus Wibowo
Pemilik
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Saya cukup puas & senang dengan Sulis hotel. Saya liburan bersama Istri & anak selama 4 hari 3 malam, Hotel ini sangat dekat dengan bandara kurang lebih 15 menit dengan mobil, Sampai di Hotel kami di sambut dengan hangat, kalau di lihat dari luar hotel ini cukup sederhana tetapi sesudah sampai di Kamar kami cukup Kagum saya kasih nilai 9 buat kebersihan & design nya, saya tidak ragu untuk taruh anak saya yang baru bisa merangkak di lantai :). Untuk harga makanan di restaurant hotel jg cukup terjangkau & rasa nya cukup memuaskan. VIew kolam renang juga sangat bangus karena lokasi hotel ini sangat dekat dengan pantai jadi kalau sore hari jika tidak hujan sangat bagus untuk Foto2. ada sedikit masukan buat yang menginap rada lama di hotel adalah variasi makan pagi agar lebih banyak Variasi makananya tetapi Nilai buat breakfast juga 9 karyawan2 nya cukup ramah2. Sukses terus Sulis Hotel, liburan berikut nya Amin saya akan menginap lagi di Sulis terus pertahankan )
title: Great Hotel in Bali

text: saya check in tgl 1 Juni 2018, dan pas masuk koridor emg agak gelap sepanjang jln menuju kamar di lantai 3. Mohon dberi penerangan lbh byk biar lbh terang. Pas masuk kamar, saya takjub,kamar yg bersih dan luas, penerangan kamar yg baik, kamar mandinya bersih dan luas,kesan pertaman luar biasa, dan makan paginya enak dan bervariasi. Kolam renangnya di rooftop bagus dgn view menghadap laut. Sangat rekomended deh hotel ini. Apalg dekat dgn bandara, lbh aman lg. Terus pertahankan kualitas kebersihan dan kenyamanan hotel. Saya pasti akan kembali menginap dsana lg.
title: HOTEL BERSIH DAN NYAMAN

text: Saya familu dgn 3 anak..kamar nya luas..oke, bersih.sarapan mengecewakan..gak byk varian sm sekali..ada babi juga jd agak gmna gtu buat yg muslim.saran sy klo dtg brsama anak2 lbh baik cari hotel lain.best value hnya utk kamar aja.
title: Deffenetelly not 4 star hotel as they said

owner_response.text:
Kepada yth Ibu Isthie H.

Terima kasih sudah berlibur di Sulis bersama dengan keluarga. Ulasan Ibu Isthie mengenai varian sarapan akan kami sampaikan ke team restaurant untuk evaluasi dan perbaikan.

Mengingat Bali merupakan tujuan pariwisata internasional dengan tamu dari beragam agama & negara, bacon (daging babi asap) memang umum tersedia di hotel-hotel berbintang khususnya di Kuta karena sebagian besar tamu kami dari Australia dan Eropa. Khusus di Sulis, bacon rolls kami sediakan di tempat terpisah dan kami beri tanda tempatnya akan adanya kandungan babi. Bacon chops (irisan kecil-kecil) juga tersedia sebagai topping untuk omelet dengan tempat terpisah dari jenis makanan lain untuk menghormati tamu-tamu kami yang beragama Islam.

Sebetulnya banyak varian makanan tersedia di buffet kami yang tidak mengandung babi. Walau lebih dari setengahnya adalah sarapan Barat (berdasarkan mayoritas tamu kami), kami juga menyediakan beberapa jenis makanan Asia di samping roti-rotian, waffles dan pancakes. 

Karena kami selalu berupaya agar makanan panas di buffet tetap segar, kami sengaja mengisi masing-masing slow-cooker secukupnya dan kadang beberapa jenis bisa habis dengan cepat (diambil oleh tamu sebelum sempat diisi ulang). Andaikan ini terjadi, Ibu Isthie bisa ingatkan Restaurant Manager yang bertugas untuk segera mengisi ulang atau minta agar makanan tersebut diantar ke meja Ibu begitu selesai dimasak.

Lepas dari keluhan di atas, kami senang Ibu Isthie dan keluarga berkenan dengan kamar kami yang luas dan bersih. Bilamana ada hal-hal lain yang ingin Ibu Isthie tanyakan, mohon email langsung ke alamat kami di bawah ini. Terima kasih.

Hormat kami,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Hotel ini berada di kawasan yang tidak seramai dan semacet kuta, namun masih tetap menawarkan data tarik pantai yang pastinya dicari oleh semua penggemar pantai. 
Yang jadi keunggulan adalah kamar yang punya beranda. Kita bisa sekedar menikmati udara pantai tanpa harus keluar dari kamar. 
Kolam renang toproofnya keren ditambah dengan sarana bermain anak. Menyenangkan sekali. Soal kebersihan? Bersih banget!!
title: I'll go back, no doubt!!

text:
Sulis Hotel Beach and Spa baru saja dioperasikan di tahun ini, sehingga kondisi kamar dan perlengkapannya masih sangat baik. Lokasi hotel ini strategis, dekat dengan keramaian Kuta tapi juga masih bisa menikmati ketenangan dari pantai. Hotel ini juga dekat dengan pantai, mungkin sekitar 5 menit sudah sampai pantai Jerman. Pantainya tidak seramai Pantai Kuta, tapi enak untuk menikmatinya. Apalagi Pantai Jerman dekat dengan Lapangan Terbang I Gusti Ngurah Rai. Ini bonus, bagi anak karena mereka bisa menikmati pesawat yang naik turun di bandara. Selain itu, pantai ini juga untuk berolahragi di pagi hari. Segar. 
Sedangkan untuk menu sarapannya sudah OK, pilihannya cukup beragam. Satu hal yang saya sayangkan, untuk kopi yang disediakan adalah Nescafe. Alangkah baiknya kalau kpi yang disediakan adalah kopi Bali..
title: Lokasi hotel yang strategis

owner_response.text:
Dear Bapak Doddy,

Terima kasih sudah tinggal di Sulis bersama keluarga dan menulis feedback yang positif. Kopi Bali akan kami sediakan juga sebagai salah satu pilihan untuk peneman sarapan tanpa biaya tambahan. Terima kasih untuk sarannya dan kami menunggu kedatangan Bp Doddy lagi di lain kesempatan.

Salam sejahtera,

Paulus / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We visited the Hotel for 4 days in October 2019.We were met with warm towels and fresh fruit upon check in. The service was smooth and painless. Our room was big with a balcony and the bathroom was very spacious and modern.
The Hotel has a buffet breakfast on the 4th floor and the buffet is above average. There is a Rooftop restaurant on the top floor with a swimming pool. The service was always quick and the staff friendly. This was the best of our three hotels during our visit to Bali and we will defnitly return to this one.
title: Very Good Hotel and Friendly Staff

text: We stayed overnight here between returning from the Gili Islands and flying home and would use it again, or for a few days more. The pool area is lovely to relax with a good sized pool, it's 30 secs away from the beach and is by shops, restaurants and beauty shops. Perfect for an airport layover with nice rooms and a comfy bed. Plenty of breakfast options for vegetarians and you can ask for more options too. The homemade freshly made pancakes are nice. The coffee machine needs improving but overall a great hotel.
title: Great location, lovely pool, comfy accommodation

text: Everything was brilliant. Breakfast all you can eat with different choices. Very clean and new. Staff very friendly. Transport for free to the airport. The beach side where you can stay and have a drink  it is a bit far from the hotel.
title: Excellent

text:
Stunning sunset view while enjoying the sea breeze & sipping on a cool beverage. 
We loved it so much we stayed for dinner & were not disappointed by the extensive menu & great quality food. 
The prices were not as expensive as I thought for such a beautiful location.
title: Beautiful roof top bar overlooking beach

text: We stayed here for one night after a long flight from the UK prior to flying to Lombok. We found the Sulis Beach to be an excellent value for money option, very close to the airport indeed. The room was well appointed with a massive bed and good air conditioning, we ate dinner and breakfast there and found both to be of excellent quality, the breakfast range was huge. The restaurant is on the top floor with the open air pool that has stunning sea views. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Free transfer to the airport but not from probably owing to the taxi monopoly there. Very much recommended.
title: A superb option in Kuta

text:
Stayed here for 9 days with my girlfriend. Very happy with our stay.
We stayed in room 3211 overlooking the gardens on the Rama Hotel.
Exceptional service from all staff and very clean hotel. 
Hotel is in a quiet location as it is in Tuban, but only a 5 min walk to Lippo Mall and 1 minute to Segera beach.
Best location if you want to surf Kuta reef, airport or middles.
Our room was large, clean and very comfortable. Towel animals on the bed were cute. 
The bathroom was also a great size and was absolutely spotless with no mold to be seen.
Great view from the restaurant on the 4th floor and pool on the 5th floor.
The spa was awesome! Definitely with a visit.
Breakfast was a buffet, the food was ok but nothing amazing. but it was ample.  
Hotel is close to the airport with free transfers to the airport on departure.
.My only negatives would be:
1. No pool lounge cushions. 
2. Food not kept hot on the buffet 
We highly recommend The Sulis Hotel and will be returning in April
title: Great hotel

text: 10mins car to Nippo mall and Discovey mall. Very convenient to the Kuta beach. Clean room with nice breakfast. The best is the swimming pool at the 5/F floor! Receptionist  is very helpful especially Yuri.
title: Good hotel

text:
A lovely hotel, only 10 minutes by taxi from the International Airport and located in a nice quiet area very close to the beach and within walking distance to all the shopping malls, markets restaurants and spas, or take the boardwalk along the beach which takes you to the in the same direction.

Smooth check-in with a welcome drink and free introductory neck massage. Our room on the 3rd floor was amazing, very large room with a sofa and large chair, a very comfortable King size bed and lovely linen, fridge, complimentary tea and coffee making facilities, swimming pool towels, flip flops and nice balcony. The shower room was also very, very spacious and nicely equipped with toiletries, plenty of mirrors and night lights at your disposal. This for me was a 5* room and particularly spacious and plus for me as I was caring for my wife who has Alzheimer’s.

Breakfast on the 4th floor was complimentary with a wide choice of freshly prepared Western and Eastern delicacies to tempt you, the breakfast staff were excellent.

Dinner on the 5th floor was served overlooking the beach, we used this restaurant every evening as the choice was very good and reasonable priced, with just one disaster we ordered the sea food platter on our last night which sadly was burned to a cinder on the charcoal grill, a great pity.

The restaurant is located near the large swimming pool, with great views of the surrounding area, it’s a pity that all the spacious poolside beds are positioned so close together, as your unable to manoeuvre the beds around the parasols to give you some shade from the scorching sun.

My only real gripe is that no decent comfortable seating was available in the restaurant area to enjoy a pre or after dinner drink or chat with other guests, as we were leaving they started to rectify and modernise this area.

A lovely stay and wonderful quality hotel with friendly staff.
title: Lovely Hotel

text: This great hotel has everything you need....big room, swimming pool, kind and polite staff, restaurant, close to the airport, shopping mall, beach...We loved it ! Next time this hotel will be again our first  choice.
title: Looks like 5*

text: The rooms are large and beautiful. There is a sofa, extra chair for sitting. AC works so well!! Fridge, safe, kettle and very large bathroom. The staff are excellent and the pool is roof top so there is an excellent view of sunset over the ocean. On a somewhat clear day, you can see Agung. We ate several meals there (including complimentary breakfast) and they were very good. The location is close to shopping, tons of restaurants and spas. The beach is across the street. The hotel is quite new so everything is in excellent condition.
title: Excellent Hotel with all amenities

text:
Sulis was a great little find. The hotel has been open for a year so amenities are new and clean.

Amenities: 
The bed is massive and comfortable. Pillows are very soft so BYO if you prefer hard ones. Shower pressure is great with a rainfall shower head.

We were on the bottom floor but heard no street noise from inside. This place is super quiet. The burning of incense outside was a nice touch.

The pool is clean and very nice. Great view and you can order food and drink. Lack of shade over the pool though so take sunscreen!

Staff: 
Staff are exceptional and will go above and beyond. Did not meet one staff member that wasn't smiling. All were incredibly polite.

Food: 
Food and drinks are also excellent and well priced. If you're missing Western food have the schnitzel. It won't disappoint.
Breakfast is also very good. The juices are delicious. They do wrap the bacon around beans and carrots which is a bit odd but still delicious.

Family friendly:
There were small children around. Staff interactions with them all appeared positive. A small playground is also available on the 5th floor and there is a shallow part of the pool for them. Sulis has two lifts as well.

Spa:
The spa is great! See my review under the heading Sulis Beach Spa.

Overall, our experience was very good and we would certainly come back. Would definitely recommend.
title: Great location, staff and food

text: We were so happy with the whole place . Our rooms were big , clean , comfortable with tea and coffee . Our bed was very comfortable and our pillows perfect . A lovely quiet area close to the beach . Breakfast was varied and good . So good we are going back to stay towards the end of our travels through Bali . Good location and very good hotel .
title: Great hotel

text:
Sulis exceeded my expectations! My friend and I were only here for 1 night but wished it was longer. The room and bathroom was spacious, comfortable beds, little balcony to relax on. The staff were friendly and helpful with local information.

However, the spa was the highlight! Exceptional treatment - Sulis for Her, 3 hours of absolute relaxation. My therapist Ami was amazing, strong hands for a brilliant massage. I've had many spa experiences and this one was definitely a favourite.

Such great value for money, close to delicious street food and restaurants with both western and Indonesian cusine. 24hr mini shop very close by. 

20 minutes to the party central of Legion. The traffic is bumper to bumper so just be patient and enjoy the laid back holiday vibes! There are taxi's everywhere, just barter for the price you are willing to pay.

Didn't try restaurant but they gave us a welcome drink and fruit plate! They also give you a drink before the spa treatment and tea/fruit afterwards. 

100% recommend this hotel!
title: Modern hotel in good location

text:
Well located, very close to DPS airport. A free shuttle is provided for drop-off with other hotels of the same group.
Smooth check-in, well organized. The staff remember all details.
The room is large, clean, well equipped with a fridge at your disposal and a usable balcony for eating or relax.
5* EXTRA-ORDINARY huge bathroom, with all equipements that we would love to have at home: large mirrors (front and back), magnifying mirror, plenty of light, and so on...
Nice wiew on the surroundings from the pool.
Only the quality of the restaurant's food could be improved.
title: Wonderful stay

photos.caption: Large room with the balcony behind the bay window

text:
This is the newest hotel with the same owner as Febris Hotel and Green Garden Hotel. If you like the other two hotels, you will love the Sulis. It's in a quiet area of Tuban, just a few steps away from the beach. Staff, restaurant and Spa are great. 
Spacious rooms, extremely clean. Rooftop pool is quite big, and plenty of lounges, shade and sun areas. There is a lift to the pool area for those who have difficulty with stairs, as there is a few of them to get to the pool deck. Fantastic sunsets from the rooftop, with food and drink service there too. We were in a ground floor room and there was very little noise from the street. Plenty of places to eat and shop
In this area too. Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our 12 night stay here.
title: New Hotel has got it all!

text: great staff excellent for the money spa treatments a must so good for the money highly recommend and we were there in earthquakes rooms bed very comfy staff were lovely pool area lovely I would highly recommend
title: Great views and fantastic staff nice rooms

text: This is a nice, clean hotel.  It's close to the beach and the rooms are quite spacious.  Why not five instead of four here?  The breakfast was a little on the modest side, and what was there was hardly special, but it was certainly adequate.  The room was comfortable, but lacked a bit of character.  This is no serious criticism, just a consideration for shopping hotels.  I would return here should circumstances permit.
title: Good value for the money

text:
They will steal your money! 
Don’t give them your credit card numbers!!!
DON’T TRUST THEM!

I book in this hotel this january with free cancellation. Besides it was free, they take the first night price from my bank account without my permission! After i cancelled my reservation they didn’t give my money back! 

And it was outrageous, how they handle my complain...
title: DON’T BOOK IN THIS HOTEL

owner_response.text:
Dear David,

We're sorry that you were not happy with our booking policy. Be reminded that a deposit guarantee is required with every booking (terms & conditions have been clearly outlined in Booking.com as your booking agent). 

Your deposit has been fully refunded back to your credit card (which you used to guarantee with Booking.com) as you cancelled before our cancellation deadline. Refund process detail from our bank was already submitted to you in early June through Booking.com. However, should the sum has not arrived to your card, you must pursue its completion process with your bank with the detail from our bank.

If further information is required, please feel free to contact me at the email address below. Thanks.

Sincerely, 

PAUL / General Manager 
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Oh my goodness, so comfy we have booked again. I plan on watching an entire season of something, anything on Balinese DVD (the player I will travel with) in the most comfortable bed. Enjoying the spectacular view from the rooftop terrace. Chatting with the most amazing staff. Eating my fill of super generous portions of delicious food. Feeling confident that the shower will work and the air conditioning is cold.
I don’t really care for the pace in Kuta and will not leave this hotel, I don’t need to.
title: Most comfortable bed in Bali!

text: A relatively new, very clean, big room and bathroom, family room is excellent. Location is great, although not exactly beach front but beach is easily accessible.  Swimming pool is amazing at roof top with awesome view.
title: Ideal hotel for family

text:
3 star rated hotel that comes with 5 star service. Good location with lovely and friendly staff! the fried noodle, bacon wrap and creamy soup is a must try!
Room is spacious and comfy. And not forgetting the soothing and relaxing Balinese massage - highly recommended!
title: Nice location

text: We went here a couple of times for a meal, fantastic views and the food was exceptional. The staff were so helpful and did not mind adjusting the menu to suit my needs. Very reasonable prices with great service
title: Great food

text: Stayed here as we wanted somewhere near airport for transit and were really surprised at how good the hotel is. Beautiful large rooms which were very quiet, and the rooftop pool was fabulous. Had dinner in restaurant on top floor after watching the sunset and food was ok, something they could improve on maybe. Staff were lovely and we would go back here again if we need a place near airport again.
title: Great place near airport

text:
We use to come to the same location when it was the Green Garden Hotel and Spa.
We watched it veing knocked down and rebuilt and it was worth the wait.
Many of the staff are back, with the same great service.  The hotel has a great restaurant on the 4th floor with lovely views of the beach and on the 5th floor is the roof top pool.
We had the all you can eat breakfast  (served 7am - 10am) for 99,000rp per person ... yum.
We booked in for the spa and had the 2 hour Bali Paradise package at 319,000rp including taxes, WOW
title: Peaceful and relaxing

text: I walk to hotel from airport, but they give me free transfer on checkout. Checkin is quick, and friendly with fresh fruit for guests. Breakfast is awesome. I was late little bit for buffet but staff and lovely manager provided me fruit, fresh mix juice, fri rice, bacon roll with boiled veggie. All taste well. I did walked from hotel to Warung Chef Bagus, a pork rib restaurant locate in downtown Kuta so I give good score to location. Room, terrace, shower, swimming pool area are all clean. Feel free to book here and enjoy. And please to turnoff aircon when you go out of room to save our planet!!! 3 minute walk to beach
title: Good choice before fly to Komodo island!!!

text: Great quiet location. Spectacular views from the rooftop restaurant, best nights sleep we had had during our 2 week stay throughout Bali. Very clean, great showers, large rooms..staff are amazing! I will be back to stay again and could not recommend the Sulis highly enough! Loved it!
title: Loved it!

text: Value for money. Huge spacious rooms. Very helpful staff, all in all had a great week staying in the hotel. Very close to the airport and walkable distance to local shop, st. Xavier’s Church and waterbom water park.
title: Excellent

text:
That was a really amazing experience in Sulis Hotel, Due to the flight delay I reached the hotel closer to 11.pm. I was hungry and I had to go back the airport again to pick up another friend of mine too. The restaurant was closed and i did not want to go out and try other restaurants around as that was the first time in Bali. 

when I told the receptionist that I am hungry and do not want to go out, she checked with the kitchen and arranged dinner for me and my friend too. Very big thanks to receptionist" Sri".

room was exactly the same as the photos on the website, very clean and large rooms. large and very comfy bed, bathroom was spotless, very clean linen no stains, daily  housekeeping maintain the standard of the hotel,

we stayed there 4 nights but never felt the b'fast buffet was boring, Good selection of food. 3- 4 types of juices, fresh fruits, and many more varieties of hot food.

the rooftop pool is amazing and one minite walk to the beach. Very close to everything, 

very friendly and helpful staff. including security.

Highly recommend for anyone. I promise you won't disappoint at all.
title: Absolutely great

text: The property was recently renovated and was spic and span. The staff ensured that their service is great and delivered to all our requests. The view from the restaurant section and pool area was breathtaking. One could actually see airplanes taking off and landing and enjoy the vast ocean in front. It was definitely value for money
title: Very clean

text:
Well we were very happy with our choice and extended our stay to 15 nights( from the original 7) the rooms are magnificent, spacious yet cosy,fabulous beds although they are high to get onto if you have mobility problems. The bathroom is large and the shower is powerful. The shampoo and body wash were really nice. You could hear people next door but not to the extent it disturbed you. The pool was very good. The only two negatives I would say is they could improve the lounges poolside by having  cushions on them. The bare wicker is uncomfortable. The breakfast need improving, very little change in 15 days. The food was Luke warm and the caramel chicken, sausage on a stick with sauce and bacon wrapped around a piece of carrot and a green bean appeared for 15 days. The staff in the dinning area were lovely, but the dinning room and breakfast menu need revamping. 
I will stay there again .
title: Quiet hidden gem

text:
i just love this hotel, and feeling want to stay here again if i visit Bali for next time..
Although the front desk seems a bit "old" and so simple, the room is incredibly nice. It is so large, everything is clean and comfortable, the balcony is so nice *i got the view of the other hotel's nice area ;p
another great point is the rooftop pool with the view of the sea, it's just so lovely.
It took only 5 minutes to the beach by walking. 
The staffs are friendly, the food for breakfast was ok although there is only some variant of the food, but you can enjoy the view of the sea while having breakfast. 
I stayed here for my last day in Bali, felt so comfortable till didn't want to go back home ;D
title: feel at home ;D

text:
We stayed at Sulis for 5 nights from 18th to 23rd Nov. Got an amazing deal which I couldn't refuse. Simple looking lobby at the entrance, but once you enter the rooms, it's simply wow! We stayed in the Deluxe room - nice, clean, spacious with a balcony. Housekeeping did a splendid job every day. The rooftop pool was the highlight, clean water and splendid view! Restaurant had limited options, but the food was amazing. 
Pro's: clean, away from noise, walking distance from restaurants, groceries, rooftop pool, good food, best waffles and pancakes, and more
Con's: nothing to complain, just a variety in breakfast options would have been simply perfect!
title: Super Saver!! Amazing property, value for money and great rooms!!

text:
Just come back from a 5 night stay here, & have to say that this hotel was just PERFECT. From checking in & a welcome bowl of fruit to checking out everything was spot on. The room was spacious, very clean & the BIGGEST bonus were the universal plug sockets no need for any adapters...Genius. It is very close to the airport so great for plane spotting but never noisy. The pool on the roof was brilliant, never busy which made it like a private pool for us. The food was good & not overpriced & the beer always cold. A big shout out to the staff who were always so happy & helpful, only a young bunch but so hard working. The breakfast selection was good with omelette or waffles made to order. The beach was a 5 minute walk away & nice & quiet. A free lift back to the airport too...

Overall this was just PERFECT for us & would without a doubt recommend it to anyone.

Thanks to all the staff.
title: AMAZING

text: Everything about Sulis is just too good. Room has lot of amenities and is always kept clean, so very spacious, and since ours was a top floor room, the view from it was so beautiful. The Staff is very friendly . A special mention to the room service staff, you guys are just amazing and cheerful!! It feels so good to be surrounded by people who constantly greet you with a smile :) Thank you guys. Awesome food, relaxing spa, and a roof top swimming pool to just sit back and relax. Sulis hotel is worth choosing for. Pocket friendly, situated at the heart of Kuta city and very close to the Airport. Overall, me and my husband are very happy for choosing Sulis, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay :) -Lisha and Aldrin
title: Just so awesome!!

text: Recently stayed here for 4 nights and it was pleasant. Came to know that its a newly opened hotel. For the price i paid,i was satisfied. Room and hotel grounds were clean. King sized bed was comfy and sheets were clean. Shower was equiped with heater that took a few seconds to get heated and pressure was good. Swimming pool was great and the view from the top was amazing. My only cons would be the buffet breakfast spread was a bit disappointing as they roughly served up the same menu as i was there for 4 nights. Location was also a bit far from the main kuta beach,Grab would cost about 25k to the main kuta area.Did manage to walk back from kuta beach to the hotel though though the beach access 1 evening. Theres a beach (pantai jerman) right across the hotel. Lippo mall was however nearby. The distance to the airport wasnt far either and they provided us free shuttle to the airport on our departure day. You do need to walk out a little to get grab cars as there is a local taxi transport booth right opposite the hotel in which some grab car drivers were afraid to pick up passengers from the lobby but i had no issues at all. All in all, not too bad for a 4 night stay! Good Job Sulis!
title: Worth it!

text: Stayed here 3 nights before moving to meet friends and loved being so close to airport after an evening flight. Huge comfy room with the best super king bed and downy pillows. Bathroom was super clean and modern tho hairdryer not the best for styling. Breakfast buffet was okay with most catered for. Eggs and pancakes/waffles, fresh fruit and juices. Great considering the room rate was inexpensive. Restaurant upstairs 5th floor is a great place to watch sunset over the beach and enjoy tasty food at good prices. Rooftop pool is ok not huge but great for a night dip. Spa here is excellent and very reasonable too.
title: Quiet 3 night stay

text:
I am amazed at the quality this hotel has to provide for the price it offers.

Beautiful rooms, comfortable beds and squeaky clean bathrooms and 5 star roof top swimming pool over looking the sea , not sure what else we can ask for $60 per night price. The staff are courteous ,welcoming and pleasantly smiling. The lobby is a turn down, but who cares when you have a beautiful rooftop swimming pool overlooking seas side sunrise and sunset on the top. Breakfast is nothing great to write about , but considering the overall ambience and hotel i rate this as one of the finest in Kuta regions in a serene environment. Special mention about Indira in the spa , she gave a fantastic  and soothing balinese massage .
title: Amazing Hotel - Worth more than its price

text:
We stayed 21 nights at the Sulis & enjoyed every minute!!! The staff were welcoming and warm! The kitchen staff and waiters exceptional! We stayed in a family room which was big & very clean and new! We had ocean views which was gorgeous to wake up to every morning! Breakfast was great! We aren't fussy so eggs & pancakes were our choice! The food form the restaurant was yummy & reasonably priced! The view from the rooftop was stunning! The rooftop pool was so inviting & overlooks the ocean and surrounding hotels! If I had to leave any recommendations it would be to better the wifi in the pool area as I couldn't connect up there, and probably just figuring out something to put on the bottom of the chairs for when breakfast opens at 7am on level 4, as we stayed on level 3 just underneath and the sound of the moving chairs was quite loud especially with a 14 month old, but I do understand it may be something that can't be helped! 
Would recommend this hotel to everyone and will definatly be returning!!!
title: Amazing!

text: This hotel is perfect for what we were looking for. The staff welcomed us with a fruit bowl and were very friendly. They took us to the room and it was huge! Very clean and comfortable and the shower was very nice too. As we had an early flight so they delivered a breakfast box to the room at night. It's in a good location and is a short walk to restaurant and shopping. I highly recommend this hotel if you don't mind a short walk.
title: Overnight stay before a flight

text: beautiful big rooms, close to the beach and the view from the roof bar/resteraunt and pool is great. best place to sit and watch the sun set. Very friendly and helpful staff just make things even better.
title: Fantastic stay

text:
Well we stayed here for 6 days and were in awe since the moment we arrived. The staff greeted us with fruit refreshment and a complimentary shoulder massage. The room was pretty spacious and very comforting.
Hotel staff deserves a special mention for being very courteous & friendly. Housekeeping did an excellent job of keeping the rooms nice and tidy, front desk was always available and helpful. Although we stayed here for 6 days but there was always something new in the breakfast menu, it was delicious and wholesome. Yummy waffles and pancakes. Same go for Lunch & Dinner options, be it indonesian or western cuisines, kudos to all the super chefs. 
Last but not the least, Spa services are a must try when in Sulis. Specially the package services & amazingly skilled spa staff will surely take you to a heavenly body experience.
We enjoyed every bit of our stay here, recommended highly for a pleasant and relaxing balinese vacation.

P. S.- Terrace swimming pool with stunning sunset views is even better than in the pictures
title: Quite, Quaint & Lively!

text: Located 2 minutes walk from Kuta beach. Spacious rooms and bathroom. Rain shower. swimming pool on roof top. good breakfast but same menu all three days.Staff very good and cooperative. Reception responded to e mails prior to stay quickly. King bed did not have single mattress but two single bed mattresses were joined.
title: Value for money

text:
Sulis Beach Hotel open in May and is in a great location across the road from the beach at Pantai Jerman at Tuban end of Kuta (airport end). With white sand beach and clear blue water at your doorstep this property has every thing you can want for the price.The roof top pool is a beautiful area with great views but can be very hot.  The roof top eating area is great for an afternoon drink to watch the sunset. The restaurant also has great views of the beach, food however is basic.  Breakfast buffet is a mix of Asian and Western food. However some of their ideas are somewhat strange (satayed sausage skewers and bacon wrapped around a bunch of beans) it would be better just kept simple with sausages and bacon.  The service is very disorganized except for a couple of great waiters who are better at customer service than the manager who has no idea.  The blonde Asian hostess is a misfit, poorly groomed and not in a uniform (not a good look), this role would be better if they had a lovely Balinese hostess in Balinese uniform. Dinner and lunch menu are average.   But the upside is there are a lot of restaurants around the area to choose from.  Holiday Inn across the road has a great restaurant with reasonably priced meals and beautiful food, as happy hour 2 for one cocktails.  Quality of spirits served at Sulis is very poor, the Gin tasted like gasoline.

Rooms are beautiful, with comfortable beds and outstanding bathroom. Rooms on upper floors have ocean views from the balcony. 

A very quiet property that I would stay at again as it is out of the hustle and bustle.

The Spa is amazing and is better than luxury hotel I have been to, with a great menu of treatments that are VERY reasonable.

An easy stroll along the beach front pathway to Kuta Art Markets (15 minutes), where you will find some lovely restaurants and places to stop for a cold drink.

It is sometimes hard to get a cab from out the front although hotel reception will call one for you.  The drivers across the road need to be bartered down.  I used Uber a lot on this trip and it was great and very cheap.
title: Great value and location

text:
We stayed in a family room with our 2 small children for 4 nights. Room was spacious, super clean, beds comfortable, well furnished with everything we needed. Even black out curtains and glazed windows for sound proofing. We were on the 3rd floor with ocean views.

Complimentary buffet breakfast on the 4th floor was great, good spread of food catering to a wide audience. Nice roof top pool too including pool towels.  Excellent value for money. Our only complaint was the movement of tables and chairs in the restaurant in the floor above our room was quite noisy and woke us early in the mornings. 

This hotel is well worth a visit, staff are friendly and service is excellent.
title: Nice Surprise

owner_response.text:

Glad you loved your recent stay. Your lovely feedback and suggestions were also noted with many thanks. After using several different caps from plastic and rubber, we are still yet to find the best suitable type so the chairs won't create any noise to the rooms below when being moved.

We look forward to having you again on your next Bali holiday. Thanks again.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager

text:
staff were amazing, room was brilliant and food was exceptional!
highly recommended :)
i stayed with my wife and 2 young children and we all loved it. the pool was great and if you are looking to see the sunset there is nowhere better than the restaurant!
title: fantastic, friendly, amazing stay in nice peaceful location

owner_response.text:

PAUL / general manager

text:
Wow!! Is all I can say. 
For the price and what you get, I would definitely stay here again. 
3 nights for under $200. 
Location is nice and quiet yet not far from all the action of Kuta. 
Room was huge and new looking with double glazed windows/door to verandah. 
Bathroom was massive. You could definitely swing a cat in there. Lol
Breakfast was pleasant with enough variety to sustain anyone. Actually, I wasn't expecting it to be as good. 
All the staff were friendly and helpful. Room service was excellent. 
Rooftop pool hast the best view of the sunset. Only negative is that there was no shade around the pool. 
Although, very close to airport you couldn't hear any noise from it. 
Walking to Lippo Mall was easy and close (5-10mins). 
Looking forward to staying here again.
title: Great big shiny room...

owner_response.text:

Many thanks for your stay last month and taking time to review the hotel. We are immensely happy to learn that you loved everything we offered.

Since beginning of last week, sun shade has been installed above all sun loungers at one side of the rooftop pool.

We look forward to hosting you again on you next Bali holiday. Please feel free to let me know if you need any update. Thanks.

text: We stayed for 3 nights and the stay was very comfortable. The Spa services are fully recommended. The breakfast is good and the location of the restaurant at the fourth floor adds a very relaxing note to the experience. But I missed any sort of fruits in the breakfast buffet and was wondering about it. The rooms are as shown in the photos and are spacious with a very nice balcony. The location is great and very close to a smaller part of the beach. It is a 20 minute walk to the malls or the beach walk part/ many good restaurant nearby. It is very close to the airport and taxis are available outside.
title: Excellent Stay

owner_response.text:

We are glad that you loved your hotel stay and spa. We look forward to hosting you again on your next Bali holiday.

text:
We met up with friends staying here and went to the rooftop pool and restaurant.
All meals were fantastic and the view of German beach in Tuban is spectacular at sunset.  Drinks are reasonably priced, little more than street cafe prices but view and atmosphere is worth itm
title: Great views great position

text: We are staying for couple nights. The hotel is looks new and the room is move interior But I'm a little bit uncomfortable with the restaurant staff cause it takes them 47 minutes to serve my food. I saw the management is not manageable properly or maybe there is no Manager or supervisor since the bartender could be the waitress and the cashier could be the waitress, it's seems the staff has double job except the receptionist or the security downstairs. I hope the management is serve the food faster enough so the customer won't be waiting too long.
title: Slow staff at the Restaurant

owner_response.text:
Dear Ibu Dewi S,

Many thanks for your recent stay for a couple of nights and taking time to write a review.

We apologize for the discomfort with the slow restaurant staff. You are right that the service team in the restaurant needs a better coordination as team works are not at their best yet. The teams have actually been progressing pretty well if we compare their performance 2 months ago while most of them are still very young. We are working very hard to improve it to the standard we'd like it to be; I am sure it will be at better speed on your next visit.

Your positive feedback on the room's interior and the hotel in general are noted with thanks.

Sincerely,

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Hotel is nice. Welcome Fruit bucket is really good. Rooms were spacious enough. Amenities were good too! Rooms were clean but there were mosquitoes. So we had to asked front desk for spray.
They should improve their Breakfast menu. They may include some more variety of Salads or Cold Pastas and main meals in Breakfast Menu. They can offer sea food grill in the hotel restaurant. Though we didn't try in their restaurant. Didn't get time to try their food.
Hotel Lobby doesn't seem to be gorgeous. Spa is really good. We loved their Spa! Swimming pool is good too. Beach is 2 mins walk from hotel.Lippo Mall is around 7/9mins walk.
 Overall Good experience. Will surely come back.
title: Nice Stay!

text:
The Sulis Hotel is located in my personal happy place in Bali…that being Tuban.

I have stayed at the Sulis on three different visits to Bali. All three visits I have been delighted with it in every respect. 

On my last visit I sustained a very serious injury whilst surfing very close to The Sulis. The staff of the Sulis were like a family to me…they wanted to take me to hospital but it was best to wait for the ambulance. They came to visit me in hospital and bought me beautiful fresh fruit baskets. The kindness was humbling. 

Thank you Sulis Hotel.
title: A very special place....

owner_response.text:
Dear "Kiwisurfer49"

Being our repeat guests since we open 2 months ago, you've been an extended family to us all at Sulis. Hopefully, you will recover soon from your surfing accident and are fit to travel again so we can see you soon. Please take care.

Love from us all,

Sulis staff & management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The hotel locates near to the airport. Even with the traffic jam, it only took less than 30 minutes after touch down at the airport. Very quick check-in. The internet speed in room is decent. Can order food into the room till 10 PM and the fried noodle is worth trying. Even though the staffs' English is not very good, they are very welcome and helpful. Will book here again as the room and services are value for money.
title: Economy hotel near to the Beach and Airport

owner_response.text:

text:
Having stayed at Patra Jasa nearby a number of times plus a number of other big hotels in Kuta and Nusa Dua over the years, popped into this hotel - actually the construction site - in 2016 and decided to try out the new property if completed by July 2017.

The hotel has been open for two months now and we're staying 9 nights (#3013) this time. The first impression is excellent:

PROS

1 Very good location along Jalan Wana Segara, opposite the Holiday Inn and some 100-150 m to the beach walk.
2 Warm and friendly welcome by the reception staff.
3 Very good twin-bedded room with partial sea view: new, big, bright and airy with wooden furniture and functional design. 
4 Functional bathroom with a shower cubicle.
5 Big balcony.
6 Good breakfast on floor 4: strong coffee from the machine, plenty of fruit and some 8-10 hot items in buffet style. More than enough, really, and a great sea view!
7 Great friendly staff at all stations: reception, breakfast, housekeeping. 
8 Good pool on floor 5 overlooking Tuban and southern Kuta. Very good for plane spotting (a favourite hobby of ours, airlines we never see at home)!

CONS

1 Nothing really.

Do bear in mind this is a four-star property and the services reflect the general level of four-star properties in Kuta/Bali. When five-star is needed, there are many five-star properties along the same beach stretch from the older ones (i.e. Patra Jasa and Ramada Bintang Bali) to the brand new Anvaya closer to central Kuta (having tried many of them over the years!). However, the Sulis may just be our new favourite in town with the places we like in the area - slightly outside the noise & action of Kuta, yet 5 mins by taxi when needed. Couldn't be happier, really!
title: New and great four-star property!

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your recent stay and taking time to write a lovely feedback. Indeed, it made all our staff so delighted.

We look forward to another opportunity of hosting you again in near future.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We recently visited Sulis for future reference, the reception staff showed us the rooms which were very impressive, very nicely decorated, and big. The bathrooms are big and very well fitted out, the rooms are very reasonably priced at the moment, $65aud for Family which sleeps four, and $45 for Superior which sleeps two. We had lunch there which was very good, the Pasta was excellent.The staff are very friendly and helpful, Unfortunately we could not go to the pool area as it was bucketing down with rain.The beach is only one minute away, down an ally with local vendors.There are lots of restaurants nearby. The ground floor has Massage rooms, we have used these girls before at the Green Garden and Febri's and they are probably up there with the best in Bali.
title: New and Nice

owner_response.text:
Hi John,

Many thanks for your recent visit for your future reference. Your positive feedback was also noted with thanks and we were glad that you liked our new rooms, your lunch and our friendly staff.

Hopefully in near future, we can show you the pool area on the rooftop (hopefully the sun shades along the pool side will also be ready then). The semi-open restaurant on the rooftop is quite popular during sunset as it has an expansive view of the ocean.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Arrived in Kuta with my friend's family and 3 rooms were booked via Agoda. I didn't have a printout of the Agoda's confirmation but showed the receptionist the SMS from Agoda which I feel would've been sufficient. She insisted that I print out during check in. Eventually she relented and said I could send her via email once I get into the room. Passports were copied and we were given the cards to the rooms.

The hotel is new and the rooms are very tastefully done up. I took the queen sized bed but in reality, its 2 single beds joined together. Very very comfortable if you're just lying on one side of the bed. Shower gel and shampoo were provided but not the other toiletries. Water bottles were replenished every day without fail and I have to say that their house keeping staff were exceptional throughout our 6 days stay. 5 stars for them.

Breakfast was good with the usual spread. The view above was also very nice with the ocean right in front. We also had lunch and dinner at the hotel and its very affordable. Try the chicken satay. We really liked the way it was presented and it tasted like satay! Service here was also exceptional and 5 stars for them too. 

One of the best things the hotel had was the swimming pool. The kids loved it and we all had a great time having fun in the water. Drinks and food can also be served on pool deck. 5 stars for it. By the way, there's a beach like a minute walk away. Its called the German beach and they have the usual stalls selling souvenirs, beers and local cuisine. 

Pros
1. New rooms.
2. Affordable room service rates.
3. Excellent in house Spa (according to my friends).
4. Free transport service to airport.
5. High and comfortable beds.
6. Very good rates for the rooms.

Cons
1. Receptionist was somewhat polite but somehow I wasn't impressed with her when she insisted that I produce the Agoda receipt. 
2. Mosquitoes are always flying into the room and most of us got bitten. The hotel management needs to do something about this soon, if they want to retain their clients.
title: New broom sweeps well

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your recent visit. Your suggestion for check-in without Agoda voucher and solution to mosquitos in the room were noted.

Firstly, Agoda sent a hotel voucher at the time of booking which must be presented at check-in (this is compulsory written in your Agoda's booking term). If you don't bring the hard copy along, you can always email it from your mobile phone (which was requested by the Receptionist during your registration process). From your feedback, I feel the need to retrain the female receptionists again for a better communication skill.

Secondly, mosquitos should have not come into your room if the entrance door and large balcony door were not frequently open. The sensors on your entrance door and the balcony glass door showed that both doors were open quite a number times in the evening; a few even showed more than 5 minutes for each opening. Should this happen again in future, please dial 0 from your room telephone and our staff will be more than happy to spray your room at any time.

Despite the above, I am glad to learn that everything else exceeded your expectations and was much appreciated. On behalf of the staff, from housekeeping, kitchen & service teams in the restaurant, the spa therapists to the reception team, thanks so much for your favorable commendation on their works and we look forward to your next visit.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:

The staff is very friendly and the beach is one minute away. Would recomend for a short stay and if you are arriving late at night. Nice place to rent motorbike near and to change money too.

text: I booked a family room at Sulis Beach Hotel, the room is large and can accomodate to 4 adults, very clean room. But unfortunately the shower a little bit salty when we took a shower and for the breakfast i didnt get buffet breakfast maybe because its a new hotel.. overall its good to stay at Sulis
title: Good New Hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Anthony,

Many thanks for your stay in one of our family rooms. Your lovely feedback & photos were also noted with thanks.

Continental breakfast is included in the room price and is individually served as a set menu (details are outlined in the hotel's official website under Restaurant). Buffet with Continental selections are setup when the hotel occupancy is high but the selections remain the same as those with the individual serves.

Hot & cold drinks (i.e. various coffees, various teas, orange squash, Milos, etc) are setup on the buffet bench every morning regardless of the hotel occupancy.

We've just put a new water purifier for the showers. Gradually the "little bit salty" water has become fresher as the days go by. However, the water on our rooftop pool shall remain a little bit salty because it is a salt water pool.

We look forward to having another opportunity of serving you again in near future. Please keep in touch and thanks again.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stumbled across this great hotel almost by accident and we are so glad we did as they are having an opening special so we are enjoying a great room for a very reasonable price. The room is spacious, quiet and dark for morning sleep ins. Furnishings are new and luxurious - the bed is huge with quality linen and huge pillows. There are multiple power outlets, the lights are bright and fittings are modern and of good quality. The bathroom is especially impressive, huge shower, basin, hair dryer supplied and lovely tiles with soft and fluffy towels.
Breakfast is provided on the 4th floor with extensive views of the ocean and is a hearty feast. The restaurant is on the 5th floor and is cool and breezy and provides a comprehensive range of foods. There is an excellent pool on this floor too - yet to try it and a spa on the ground floor - also yet to try it.
The lobby is impressive and the staff are young, gorgeous and happy and helpful. We couldn't be happier with our choice and still have 3 days to go. Yippee!

user_location.name: Coffs Harbour, New South Wales, Australia

title: New and Snazzy

text:
Hotel is amazing with an artistic lobby. Staff was very kind and accommodating as she tries to explain the rooms that they have and even showed us the layout of a Deluxe room before we finally decided to take it.

Room is spacious, clean with a sofa and the bed is warm and plush with soft pillows. One can definitely can a good night's sleep here. Room also has a balcony with chairs and a table with a simple view of the street below. It is relaxing to sit outside especially after a downpour enjoy a cup of tea. Besides, they also have ample space for storage if you are planning for a longer stay.Bathroom is big and bright with wall sockets (UK 3 pin plugs instead of the normal Indonesia 2-pin plug) and hairdryer ready. Water in the bathroom is a little salty but not a major let down.

They also have a swimming pool on the top floor big enough for a casual swim with a view of the nearby beach and surrounding area. Not to mention that they even have facilities like a saloon and massage parlor in the hotel itself. 

Breakfast provided was great with very friendly staff to help you out. Only thing is they have limited menu available now.

Overall, it is a good place for people who wants to relax and have a peaceful and quiet time to enjoy the full hospitality they have to offer.
title: Pleasant, Comfy, Classy

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your lovely feedback, Mr Ng. Let me assure you that the hotel experience will get better on your next Bali holiday as the hotel is on soft opening.

Looking forward to welcoming you again in near future.

With warm regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This hotel is awesome to stay at,.  The staff are so friendly and helpful, the rooms are bigger than other hotels, the rooms are like new and have a king size bed with quality bed sheets and pillows ,as new bathroom is really clean  the 
hotel is only a few minutes walk to Jerman beach and the hotel is in a quiet area but not far walk to shops etc
This hotel I would give a 10/10 to as it's really nice and clean and has a beautiful views from the rooftop restaurant or pool
We'll done Sulis hotel 🥰
We will be back to stay there
title: Best ever hotel

photos.caption: On bed when first check in
Rooftop pool and restaurant.  Beautiful view
Rooftop views from restaurant and pool

text: Sulis Hotel is a nice and very clean hotel in convenient location, close to the Airport. As we flew in in the evening, this was a big relief. Very reasonably priced, very friendly straff,  especially Rini, who was very supportive in organzing our Reservation. Big rooftop pool, nice to sit at rooftop terasse in the evening.
title: Nice and clean,  close to beach and airport

text: We stayed for 5 nights in Sulis hotel and we were more than happy! Close to the airport and 2 minutes from Pantai Jerman beach on foot if you want to be next to a beach. Room was huge with big balcony and the most comfortable mattress i had in a hotel! Bathroom was also very big,Wi-Fi was free and working perfect.There was a fridge in the room and very good air condition system. We used the pool a few afternoons and it was always empty but we enjoyed it! Breakfast could be better,it was ok ! A big plus was the free parking because we rented a scooter !
title: A very good Choice

text:
Stayed here because of good reviews and definitely agree with all the goods.
The hotel is very clean, 5 stars standart. The room is huge, big comfy bed with great pillow and sheet + Big sofa in the room.
Honestly the room worth more than the price. The another facilities is so so, but still okay in the price range.
title: Amazing hotel room very close to the beach

text:
This resort punches above its weight. It is in a very nice location and is comfortable with a lovely pool and rooftop area. 
If I were to improve anything it would be to put in a gym and also a good movie channel on the TV.
title: A very good stay

text:
Lovely hotel in a great location 
Good location near the airport out of the noise of Kuta but within east walking distance. Lots of restaurants, bars, shopping mall & supermarkets on the doorstep & 2 minutes walk to the beach. The room was clean & spacious the bed was extremely comfortable. The roof top pool area was relaxing & quiet. Breakfast order was taken the day before, there was UK, USA & Indonesian options. The food was freshly cooked & served to your table. We would definitely recommend this hotel & will stay here again when we visit Bali.
title: Great stay in a good location

text: Mum and I went back to our favourite spa today at Sulis. We both had the Bali Paradise package with was 2hrs. It was lovely to see the staff and everything was as we remembered from our last visit in 2019. Clean, air con rooms and Mum & l were able to be in the same room, which was fun. Thanks to Srinata and Yudi we'll be back.
title: Spa day with Mum

text: I am currently staying at the Sulis Hotel for a second time. I originally only booked 12 nights here but have just extended my stay for another 10 nights as I am so happy here and feel safe. The hotel is opposite the beach and close to restaurants, markets and Lippo Shopping Mall. The staff are so friendly and accommodating and the rooms are cleaned superbly. I am happy that there is no buffet as the hotel is following health regulations as in many other countries where buffets are banned. The rooftop pool and views are stunning. I will definitely be staying here on my next visit.
title: Fantastic Hotel and Staff

text: This was the third time we have stayed at this hotel and previously had a great stay but since reopening they are trying too hard to cut back on costs. The rooms are still lovely but changing to a set breakfast is penny pinching, if you wanted an extra tea you were charged, we didn’t like the mushrooms and tomatoes and could we substitute those for an extra slice of bacon but we couldn’t but we could have a hash brown instead, but they did relent later. Understaffed and nobody answered the bell in pool area for drinks. We loved this hotel but won’t be going back until they do buffet breakfast and improve their service. Shame.
title: Too many cut backs

owner_response.text:
Dear Robert

Thank you for returning to stay with us recently (for the 3rd time 😊). 

I apologize for the inconvenience due to some closures of the hotel's facilities. Please note that the hotel price has been reduced accordingly (as such has been notified in the hotel's website). However, I'm pleased to let you know that the restaurant has been reopened for lunch & dinner as well as the pool service by the bells as of 14 Nov 2022.

Guests who book for a room-with-breakfast can now choose any of 12 set menus (there were 9 sets when you were here). Details will be updated in the hotel's website under RESTAURANT and BREAKFAST MENU. Our most popular breakfasts are still the American and English set menus which includes a cup of freshly brewed coffee, tropical fruits and orange juice (the whole set costs less than AUD 7 if you pay at the hotel). 

Alternatively, if you are not sure with the breakfasts at the hotel, please book for the room-only (without breakfast) which is of a lower room price and you can later decide for your breakfast options. 

The old all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast, unfortunately, will not return as the cost & wastage would push the room price up significantly (well beyond our repeaters' acceptable range). Nevertheless, if such buffet breakfast is what you need, please book for the room-only as you always love our hotel rooms. You can always find buffet breakfasts at the surrounding hotels, depending to your budget & preference, from as low as AUD 10 per person for a basic spread to AUD 30 for an expansive spread (there are many available in between that price range nearby if you wish). 

We look forward to having you again on your next Bali holiday.

Best regards,

Paulus Wibowo
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Booked for two nights although we were coming in early the next morning (so we could have a room and not have to do an early check-in).  The staff could not have been any nicer.  The food at the restaurant was fantastic.  The room was very large and clean.  The pool was large and lounge chairs were comfortable.  Wifi worked very well - was able to work without any interruptions.  Views from the room and rooftop pool were very nice.   Would stay here again.
title: Great Staff and Food

text: the  Sulis beach Hotel gets a big 10 out of 10 from  us though its a bit out of the way it was clean  and quiet big rooms with balcony  its dowm near Bali airport it took 45 min to walk to Kuta beach and that was walking along the beach on a foot path will be going back
title: sulis hotel

text: I am always a bit reluctant to write a review on this amazing wonderful Hotel, as I am afraid that I one day will find it booked out! I simply cannot praise this hotel enough. Yes it's a hotel with a lift something that in Bali some folk may not like, I understand it's not "traditional" however, having stayed all over this wonderful Island I love the comfort of the room, the bed is super comfy (a rare find) the fridge in the room is big, and the bathroom is massive. Yes it's basic however, good basic, no fuss, beautiful bright and roomy. The staff are simply delightful no fuss and very humble, Wuyan on Reception is just beautiful along with Bagus whom was always their with a smile each morning serving our delicious breakfast, housekeeping is fabulous and super clean. The location is great, so peaceful at a wonderful local beach in Pantai Jerman. Its the next Cangguu!!
title: The best kept secret in Tuban

text: Wow…best hotel with awesome rooftop pool. Great service. All the staff was very humble and helpful. Pool was unbelievable. Stayed there for 1 week. Will stay there again on my next visit and recommend this too. Market is also near by, loved it
title: Great pool, great service, humble staff, great food. Best hotel in Bali

text:
After travelling in Indonesia for four months, we chose the Sulis Beach Hotel for our last few days before a long flight out. We are so happy to have stayed here. beautiful and clean, big rooms, close to Pantai Jerman for dinner and drinks at sunset on the beach and close to everything else.
We have stayed at some pretty shabby properties post- covid, but the Sulis Beach Hotel was sensational.
They offer a good price and the breakfasts were good. Ample and tasty- just remember to pre-order.

This is one we will be recommending to all our friends, just hope it doesn't get too busy so that we can get a room!
title: What a Find!

text:
Sulis is so good!
Great value
Huge rooms that are spotlessly clean
Stunning top deck pool area and viewing platform of surfing reefs
Top location 
Nice food
Excellent staff (Sri was so helpful!)
You get what you want here!
Will be a regular here definetely 😎✅💯
title: So Good is Sulis!

text: Just the perfect place to stay if you want to be near the airport but out of the Kuta madness. If you are planning to surf any of the reef breaks nearby you can check them from the rooftop. The rooms are large and the staff are very helpful. The value for money here is unbeatable.
title: Perfect for a surfer

text: the bedroom is very spacious and bath room is very clean , although a bit damp (maybe because of the pandemic effect) parking is a bit cramped, breakfast in the form of a set menu placed in 4th floor under pool floor
title: best 3 star hotel in KUTA

text:
Me n my family use to stay at Holi*** I** Ba**na when we travel to Bali, unfortunately on that day we didn't get the room we use to be due to they have group fill in the hotel, that make us end up at Sulis beach hotel.

Surprisingly we found that We love the property, the kids love the playground and the pool they have on the rooftop. They have big room so our 2 yo boy could have more space to play with his sister. The room and public area are well maintained. 

Few inputs I had: 
- the linen need to be overlook as some of it have holes n tired. 
- parking lot are limited maybe when high occupancy of parking lot the hotel car could find alternative spot and make use of the space available for hotel guests
- shades for kids pool

Summary: we love the hotel and for sure will comeback.  Thank you Sulis beach hotel
title: A very good property

text:
Booked for only one night as we arrived at 1 am and hotel situated close to airport. Despite the time, staff greeted us warmly and got sorted in our rooms very quickly.
Family room had plenty of space. Good breakfast in the morning. Kids liked the roof top pool area, although would be pretty hot during the day.
Hotel was great for what we wanted at a good price.
title: Quick enjoyable stay

text:
Very thing in this hotel was spotless sooo clean I could eat me food of the floor! Staff always greeted us with a smile and nothing was to much trouble. Bathroom was big, huge shower!! Food & drink tasted great and great price, we ate at the hotel every night of our stay to enjoy the sunsets. Breakfast had a big selection and changed everyday, egg, pancake station. 
The only problem I found staying with my young daughter was our room was under the restaurant so at night we could hear people moving there chairs until the restaurant closed.
Would definitely stay again and recommend to family & friends.
title: Absolutely beautiful

text:
Stayed for 2 nights. Clean comfortable room. Good variety of breakfast. In-room dining food was delicious. Staffs were excellent. 
Good location. Walking distance to the beach and shopping mall. Next to the airport.
Would stay here again.
title: Very good

text: Great value hotel! We had 2 adjoining rooms. Rooms were large with plenty of room to move, nice balcony with table and chairs. Large comfy bed. Rooftop pool is beautiful, with a shallow area great for kids. Rooftop restaurant fantastic on a nice night to watch the sunset, or the indoor restaurant on 4th floor. Food is good and reasonable priced. Staff friendly and helpful. Plenty of shops and cafe within walking distance, as well as good money changer. Best food we had in Bali just a few minutes walk away at "Gala More". Starbucks 5 min walk.  Short taxi ride to central Kuta, great beaches and Beachwalk mall. Great value.
title: Fantastic Hotel!

text:
It was a great and incredible experience , clean hotel , big rooms with good view from balcony , all your needs will be found at your room and professional staff , all are amazing especially the roof pool , spa and massage were great ( atmosphere , professionalism ) i did twice lomi lomi and balinese massage. Reception especially yuli were very friendly , security , housekeeping especially kantona.
Location is excellent less than 10 min to airport. Please don't hesitate to book there , your trip will be more amazing when you stay at sulis beach hotel really !!
title: Egypt

text: What can I say staff are friendly, happy to help. Hotel is clean and newish. Rooms are great, cleaned every day with towel animals on bed. Food was lovely with plenty of variety. Breakfast had plenty of choices. My only issue was the pool area, it was so hot up on the rooftop. The umbrellas are too small to cover 2 lounges & there is no trees for shade. Couldnt sit up there for long as the glare off the pool was too much. That is my only gripe. Views were amazing. Would only stay again if pool area was changed.
title: Love, love, love

text: Very clean, great views, yummy food - generous size portions and awesome staff! 10/10! I will definitely be back here, love our standard room very cold aircon and the location is great too. Rooms are quite large and hotel grounds very clean and well kept.
title: VERY CLEAN GREAT VIEW

Beautiful bathroom, not a smudge on the windows or mirrors. We had lunch on the rooftop, food was average priced but the portions were a good size! The view is amazing and staff have good service. This is our first time here but definitely not our last. We love our standard room and the location, hotel and everything! 10/10

text: A beach side boutique hotel located in the quiet south end of Kuta Beach, Sulis Beach Hotel and Spa offers its guests a relaxed and casual atmosphere. The spacious and comfortable rooms of the hotel offer an unforgettable tropical view of the turquoise ocean and the golden stretch of breath-taking beach. The hotel’s international restaurant offers a variety of western food as well as favorite dishes from Java, Sumatra, and Bali.
title: Our Beach Perfect Beach Stay

text:
My husband and I went to the Spa today and each received the Bali Island package (foot bath, massage, facial), 2 hours worth of pampering for only Rp. 290.000 plus tax. The staff were great, everything was very clean and pretty. We received a delicious drink and cool towel while we got our foot bath and then we went and had an amazing massage topped with a facial that made us glow. I can’t remember the last time my skin was so soft and it all felt great. 

We have also been for dinner a couple times in the last few days. Pasta Carbonara so yummy!  garlic bread great!  Grilled Lobster awesome and so much cheaper than we are used to at home.  Hawaiian pizza was delicious. Spring rolls not bad but I’ve been eating a bunch at Rama Beach (next door) and they are better there. Deep fried ice cream fantastic. Cool breeze, nice view from the 5th floor (elevator up), fish swimming around the edges, awesome staff, clean and comfy and reasonably priced.  Added bonus, a complementary 5 minute massage while you wait for your food when available. We actually got one after dessert on our first visit.
title: Spa and dinner

text:
From the the moment we checked in we were very comfortable. This hotel is very very clean, the staff are so friendly, the food is great and the views from the rooftop pool and the rooftop restaurant are breathtaking. 
The spa treatments are excellent. We went 4 times. Enjoyed every one. The girls are beautiful, professional and friendly. 
The only thing would be ceiling fans in the 4th floor restaurant for breakfast. It is open but gets a bit warm. But if air circulation would help. But that’s all. 
We were extremely happy here for the week and will definitely be back.
title: Awesome spa, awesome staff, awesome hotel

text:
If you love ambient music, professional massage therapists and stunning surroundings then the Sulis Spa is for you.  
Excellently priced, lovely location, clean and beautifully decorated. 
Jacqueline & Toyah.
title: An Ethereal Escape.

text: Stayed for 2 nights with friends..The best property I have ever stayed..Good customer satisfaction,gud hospitality..AC is very superb..Big spacious rooms,the main attractive of this property is the swimming pool in the roof top, really superb atmosphere..A must recommended property for all..Good Management
title: Excellent 👌👌

text:
We stayed at the Sulis Beach for 4 nights.
The rooms are clean and air conditioner works great. Level  5 has a swimming pool and you can order your drinks and food by pressing a button. The staff were amazing. Ray, Ari, whats the name of that great big statue on the horizon?? Wisnu! Wisnu was also very helpful as were all of the staff. 
Everything was great. Only one little thing that left a bit of a negative feeling was the system at the check in. They demanded payment upfront and periodically the room charges had to be paid off. Most hotels will wait patiently untill its check out time...this place asked for payment for room charges the afternoon before checkout. A bit odd and kind of made me feel like they eere either desperate for the money or didnt trust my security credit card that i had given them.
Appart from that, it is a good comfortable and quiet plush hotel. Food and drinks are great value. 
I recommend that you book it on line and save 300000 rupiah per night.
We needed to stay an extra night due to airline cancellation, the reception didnt allow us to book the room after 4.30 pm. They said come back in the morning, which we sweated over all night , wondering if we had to change hotels or not the next morning...that could have been done better. But all worked out in the end. 4.5/5
title: Great on Level 5

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your lovely feedback. The housekeeping team and the the restaurant service team were delighted reading your feedback; they sent their best wishes too. 

Room payment is to be settled upon check-in while incidentals (charges owed) are usually verified one day before check-out. This procedure has been implemented since beginning of last year by request of our repeat guests. Well communicated incidentals & information will likely avoid last-minute rush and ensure smoother check-out. On housekeeping note, financial matters can only be settled from 7 am until 11 pm only (beyond these hours, the front desk is manned by security team with no financial handling).

Please accept my apology for the "over-cautious" feel by the receptionist as apparently the communication was not conveyed well. Training for better communication will soon be conducted again while room booking can be made at any time (even at night) as long as the room is still available (otherwise room relocation will be advised then).

You are correct with booking online through the hotel's website as you can save cost by applying the promo code.

Finally, please keep in touch. We look forward to having you all again on your next Bali holiday and thanks again.

Sincerely,

PAULUS / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
What an amazing place to stay. I cannot fault it at all
Cleanliness is immaculate 
Staff amazing 
Rooms are modern , large and beds are so comfy
Bages our room cleaner was amazing 
Yani in the spa gives amazing pedicures 
Nothing is ever to much for them ..
title: Family Xmas holiday

text: We stayed at Sulis Beach Hotel & Spa during out visit to Bali in December. From the time we arrived up until the day we left we loved every moment. The staff was great. Always friendly and helpful. The restaurant offers a wide variety of food at great prices. Breakfast offered a variety of options.
