Rooms and grounds are well kept with very comfortable beds and great air conditioning to fight of the Bali heat. Sulis is very centrally located with lots of restaurants and shops surrounding it. The beach is only a stone throw away. I had one of the most relaxing massages at their spa and although prices are a little more expensive then some of the other places around Bali it was well worth it. I definitely recommend Sulis Beach Hotel & Spa and we will definitely stay there again should we ever return to beautiful Bali.
title: Most relaxing visit

text:
Excellent staff..food..cleanliness..perfect holiday resort for family. 
Spa was serene..clean..rejuvenating.
Food was delicious..amazing breakfast.
Hotel is quite close to the beach..making it great spot for holiday
title: Review

text:
Sulis
Spa was terrific the massage by Yani was just what I needed on Christmas Day after a long flight & 90 min in cab from airport on Christmas Eve (usually 10mjn). The rooms are large with great beds nice & comfortable, the bathroom large and balcony a nice bonus. The garden view on level 2 or is best. The rooftop pool is beautiful. The breakfast is your standard Kuta buffet best to get there earlier as tends to run low after 9.30am. 
I will booked my folks in on there return to Kuta & I would stay again. 
Thanks, the front desk service staff you looked after me really well. Thankyou
title: Great massage after a long flight

text: Went here with reservations because the price was cheap but pleasantly surprised. Look it's not greatest location but great place to stay if you arrive late at night.Room spacious,clean and bed really comfortable. Staff friendly and helpful and breaky was included. Nothing wrong with this place for a short visit.Value plus here.
title: Surprise packet

text: I’ve been twice now and loved the calm atmosphere of the Spa area. Both massages were perfect and relaxing as well as having the right amount of pressure. I’m going back today and can’t wait. Highly recommend the Lomi Lomi Massage and Hot Stones. 🙏
title: Absolutely loved the Spa Treatment

text:
Four hours of heaven experience, Widia and Yani were professional and friendly. Flexible, private and friendly service, beautiful and relaxing atmosphere, fresh and hygienic environment.
Location is 5 minutes from airport, used it for a second time following a “check out” from my accommodation and left to airport from there, taxi was provided by spa.
title: Sulis spa Divine experience

text: Like the hotel location with walking distance to lippo mall, and many eateries nearby walking distance. Not too noisy and yet less than 5 mins walk to beach. Family room is big and super clean, with strong air con and ultra huge toilet. Truly enjoyed my stay with the hotel, and definitely a great value for those with families.
title: They are much better than they seemed! Worth checking them out if you planning to stay in kuta area.

text: Excellent place to rest & for spa. Value for money and close to the beach. Place has been recently renovated and is clean and tidy. Staff members are great & helpful. The hotel is close to shopping centre & eateries. There are a few Indian restaurants nearby.
title: Rest & Spa

text: I had the most wonderful spa treatments while staying at Sulis. Prada was amazing. The massage was excellent as was my manicure and pedicure, so relaxing! Thank you so much Prada I will definitely visit again when I come to Bali again . Fantastic value for money thank you again.
title: Spa

text: I had a great time in Sulis beach hotel. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Room was spotless and huge! Super clean! Comfy huge king bed. Air con was good, wifi was strong. I love that the location is being surrounded with good cheap eateries. The pool above is amazing!!. However, breakfast needs improvement..
title: Beautiful quaint hotel in Kuta

text:
I went for 2 hours and it was great,
Lomi Lomi massage! it was Japanese , Thai , Swedish and Balinese, mixture, full bossy massage, it was really great and was very skilfully done, really good value for money
title: Excellent spa

text:
Came to bali for business trip and looking for a hotel that near the airport and Kuta area. After searching for hotels, this hotel seems nice with lot of nice reviews. This hotel located around 15 minutes from airport and in fronf of Jerman beach.

Stayed here for 3 days and it was awesome. Lobby is kind of artistic with Bali feel and the hotel room number actually not much, but the size of each room is huge if you compare with other hotel with the same price range.

The room seems modern and newly renovated. Aircon is super cool, floor was squeaky clean, wifi is fast, and the most important thing to me is they have rain shower 😃 they like to create the towel to some creation on top of your bed as well.

Breakfast was nice, buffet style, drinks quite plenty of choices and the fried vermicelli was my favorite! 

Pool located in the 4th floor and you can experience nice sunset as well.

One last thing, they do offer free airport shuttle but only from hotel to airport, not the other way around.

Over all, I would stay again here when I go to bali next time.
title: Hidden gem in Kuta area

text: Booked this hotel for a 2 night stay at the end of our Bali trip and was glad we did. Rooms are large clean and the shower pressure is outstanding. Food and drinks are good quality and well priced. The Spa was very good, so relaxing and professional.Didn't   use the pool on the rooftop, but it looked good albeit with little shade. Free airport transfer worked well and our late checkout was no problem. Special mention to Ray an employee the hotel can be proud of.
title: Very Enjoyable

text:
Everyone thinks Kuta is party central and being close to the airport would be noisy. Sulis Beach is neither.

You can lounge on the top floor pool area, chill out at the top deck dining area and watch the sun set. 

Food and drinks are great value and very good eating. 

The hotel rooms are spotlessly clean. Good air con and superb beds and pillows.

All this would mean nothing if the staff weren’t friendly. They make the place. Nothing is too much trouble.

Located close to the Lippo Mall with a cheap western cinema in the basement and plenty of food and clothing shops. 

It’s also a short easy walk to Discovery Mall without all the hassles of walking the streets. 

Taxis are easy to find at the end of Wana Segara and $5 will get you back to Legian for some faster paced living. 

Cannot recommend this hotel enough. But don’t tell everyone. 

This is our third stay and we will be back again.
title: Best of many places we have stayed in Bali

text:
My partner and muse recently stayed at the Sulis Resort and Spa hotel and have to say we will definitely return.
The rooms were huge even had a full sized fridge freezer and Foxtel very clean with our own secluded balcony.
The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly and location was good still close to busy end of Kuta but far enough to be at the quieter end.
The food was fabulous with good choice for all tastes the rooftop pool and bar which over looked the ocean with plenty of snacks and cocktails bought to you poolside.
Also a big thank you to Yudi and team at the hotel spa we were very well looked after the treatments were amazing very professional and in a clean and relaxed atmosphere my partner and we couldn’t find one bad thing about our experience at the Sulis thank you all so much
title: Hidden gem in quiet area of Kuta

text: Lovely place. We love it and we will come back for sure. Very clean! Friendly staff! Big rooms, nice bathrooms, balcony was enough big, with nice view. The swimming pool was amazing! Enough big and clean. Very good breakfast, very rich, everyone can find something. The airport is very close but there's no noise. Quite place. We like everything ❤️ Sulis, hope I see u next year ❤️
title: Miss

text: We stayed in this hotel as a stopover between other places in Indonesia and in this respect it is the best choice. The hotel is a starting point from where you can do all the things Kuta has to offer. Excellent staff, rooms which are very good hotel rooms but maybe not suitable for a longer stay, because then you would want to be more outside. All the rooms have a sort of balcony or terrace but you don’t go there because then you are in the middle of Kuta traffic. Nice swimming pool on the top floor but without the feeling that you are in the middle of nature.
title: Excellent service

text:
The Sulis beach is a great, modern, clean and friendly hotel.
Very close to the airport and in a quiet area very close to the beach.
Stayed here for 4 nights at a very good price. The free breakfast is great, mix of western food and Asian.
The roof top bar, pool and restaurant is lovely. Decent price for good quality food and drinks.
The spa is also great. I had the best massage ever. I went for the deep tissue massage, and boy, the lady had hands and elbows of steel, fantastic!!
Ask for Prada if you fancy the same.
We would definitely recommend the Sulis. There are some really up market hotels along the beach, but the Sulis is modern, clean, has large rooms, very good value, and was perfect for us. We will stay again on our next visit to Bali for sure.
title: Very good

text: Oh no the breakfast needs to change. It looks like left overs from the restaurant. I ended up having breakfast somewhere else. Everything else was fine except for the same breakfast. I was so annoyed.
title: Same breakfast everyday

owner_response.text:
Dear Miss Palesahh

We're sorry you were unhappy with our breakfast buffet selections. 

Some common breakfast items (roast tomatoes, chicken sausage, bacon with vegetable, cereals, yogurts) are indeed the same on the buffet on daily basis. However, many others are served with different ways of cooking/preparation which we rotate on daily basis such as Australian mushroom cream soup on Monday, Chinese tofu clear soup on Tuesday, Italian macaroni soup on Wednesday, Indonesian chicken corn soup on Thursday, etc. Various rotations also apply to rice dishes, noodle dishes, vegetable dishes, chicken cuts, Indonesian porridges and sweets. If none of those appeal to your liking, you can also opt for selections at our egg station for freshly made omelets, pancakes and waffles with various toppings. Fresh tropical fruits on season are also available every morning, e.g. pineapple, banana, papaya, watermelon, rock melon, purple dragon fruits, etc (at least 5 different kinds of fruits daily).

It's our attempt to provide quite varied selections on daily basis to all travelers from various backgrounds but obviously we can't satisfy everyone. Many of our selections are Asians and Indonesians as those are generally what our hotel patrons look for when holidaying in Bali (although a few European selections are available too). Nevertheless, please be reminded that breakfast is provided on complimentary with your room booking; hence you don't have to take it if the menu is not appealing to you.

On housekeeping note, we stop replenishing our crock pots on buffet 15 minutes before breakfast time ends at 10 am. If you happen to come late for breakfast, you can always ask the restaurant manager for fresh dish(es) and he/she will be more than happy to arrange for you. 

Despite the above, I'm glad to learn from your review at Facebook that you liked your rooms being spacious and clean. If further information/assistance is required, please feel free to reach out to me at my email below. Thanks.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stopped at the hotel after travelling for nearly 2 days and was warned by many friends not to stay in Kuta.
I am glad to report the hotel was way above expectation and the location quiet enough with plenty of resteraunts within a short walk or you can walk down the beach or boardwalk and into the much busier and noise Kuta.
Our room,was big clean and tidy. The breakfast buffet was fantastic with lots of choices. The resteraunt food was also very good and has a b beautiful view over the ocean.
The jewel in the Crown is the infinity roof terrace swimming pool. Fantastic to have cocktails in the pool and watch the sunset.
For us great location, food and pool and very friendly staff.
title: Great location to relax after travelling.

text: We stayed at Sulis for 4 days and the experience was beyond our expectation. The room was squeaky clean and the staffs were so much friendly... I loved how they put towels on our bed with the shape of cute elephant couple with funny eyes. The location of a hotel was perfect! About 10 or 15 minutes walk will lead you to the heart of Kuta. Sulis spa is something that you have to experience while visiting Bali. Highly recommended place to visit.
title: Simply the Best!

text: The roof pool oversees the ocean and almost all Kuta which is awesome. The place is nice and very close to kuta center. The staff are extremely friendly, once they knew that my wife is suffering from toothache, they arranged a dentist appointment upon my arrival.
title: Clean

text: We just here for short vacation . And we plan much . But hotel they do have corporate taxi like you can rent a car and a driver to take you to the place that you want to go and the price is fair. We had good time .and hotel breakfast is delicious and have good view . The hotel location near the beach you can have a nice dinner near the beach .and the room is so big with a balcony. We would love to come back again . Btw we also book a massage from the hotel and we love their service very comfortable. I recommend here.
title: Good location and nice service

text: This was a convenient hotel for being close to the airport, they offered to hold our cases as we had a later flight and provided a free shuttle service! The big problem for us was that the water in the bathroom smelt awful, even washing your hands caused problems.
title: Good as a last stay before the airport.

owner_response.text:
Dear Jacob,

Many thanks for your recent transit visit.

Your comment on the water at bathroom was noted with many thanks. I wonder if you had reported the problem to the hotel team during your stay (or simply dial 0 from your room phone). The most common remedy is to keep the water tap running and the smell should disappear within 10-15 seconds (as most probably the water had idled in your bathroom pipe longer than 48 hours). There are other causes too but should be easily rectified as soon as a report is made. One of our technicians would come to your room to fix it (as they are on stand by 24/7). In case the problem persists, a room relocation would be offered.

Despite the above, I'm glad that everything else met to your liking. Your positive comment on the free shuttle to the airport was much appreciated too (this service is provided with the hotel's compliment after guest checks out). We look forward to having you again on your next Bali holiday.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Must say this hotel was perfect for me. Located in quiet area, close to the airport. All facilities were clean and in very good condition. Honestly nothing to complain about. Good breakfast, nice roof swimming pool, friendly english speaking staff. Shops around, beach with 1 minut walk. I would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone and I will be back next year. This hotel definitely meet my needs and the price was good too. Thank you
title: Great stay in quiet Kuta location

text: Well this is the 4 th time returning once again service great hotel immaculate breakfast good If staying st this hotel make sure to book a spa package the best massage I’ve had in Bali and the massage rooms private air conditioned spotless and staff very professional Hotel is 5 to 10 mins walk from Discovery and Waterbomb beach right across road and some good eating spots in street highly recommend this hotel
title: Beautiful once again

text: Very Clean and friendly motel breakfast is basic but all food is fresh Pool area is nice Restaurant food was served nice and was tasty could get a free 5 min massage whilst waiting both in restaurant and breakfast area
title: Resort

text:
A fabulous location in the quieter end of town. We stayed here in a deluxe room for 10 days, and have finally after 20 years of travelling to Bali have found a hotel we will keep on returning too. From Staying in 5 resorts to Villas in Canggu and Seminyak,  the Sulis can match the best of them, the 40sq room is fresh the bathroom is big enough, the bed wasn't as comfortable as I had researched however, I soon got used to it. The breakfast, is not the best but adequate , the staff are friendly , housekeeping (thank you Hedra!) do a super job.  The pool area fabulous, although a little uncomfortable on the day beds as they have no mattress.  We ended up going daily across the road  to Patnai Jerman, and found a lovely little spot on the beach with an umbrella and comfy day beds and would stay their all day, a fantastic little patch with only  a few beds and an awesome bunch of locals to supply fresh pineapple and water or whatever you may want.
The absolute standout of this hotel, is the energy you get from the moment you walk in, no hustle and bustle an open air reception area with lovely staff that don't go over the top it's just perfect. And with airport about a 10 minute drive is the added bonus. To wake up and see such a stunning view with a glimpse of the ocean is also another huge attraction .. we had room 3208 overlooking the gardens of the Rama Resort.
Thankyou everyone at the Sulis for making our much needed holiday so relaxing and perfect.
title: Location Location!

text:
Just had 2 nites here.
Arrived after midnight and was greeted by friendly security staff who explained everything to us and escorted us and our bags to our room.
Was given a quiet room on the 2nd floor , the rooms are very clean and spacious, the bed was very comfortable with big soft fluffy pillows.
Our room had a lounge , desk , larger fridge , flat screen tv , room safe and the had a balcony with table and chairs.
Bathrooms have a normal and a rain shower , the bathroom was equally spacious with a full size mirror.
Breakfast is on the 4th floor and has plenty of options both western and eastern choices , staff here were lovely , spa staff walked around giving neck and back massages during breakfast so myself and my wife booked a massage appointment in the cleanest most pleasant spa in Bali.
Housekeeping staff were a delight with a new towel animal everyday.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would like to return for longer.
Thank you Sulis !
title: Fantastic hospitality

text: Me and my parents stayed at the hotel for 4 nights (from 27th July 2019 onwards) and it was amazing! I've never encountered such friendly staff! Very helpful and professional. We visited their spa as well. Five star service from check-in to check-out! Everything was so clean and well kept. Breakfast was superb too! Rooms were big and the bathroom was spotless. Daily housekeeping was there. We've enjoyed our stay here and definitely will book with them again!
title: Five star service throughout the stay!!!!!!!!

text:
The bonus of a new hotel is that is not really on the radar, yet this hotel and it’s staff really are lifting their profile. This hotel has a fresh new feel, and everything you need is a short stroll away. Located across from the beach, the prices are very reasonable in comparison to other beach front hotels. The staff a friendly and efficient. The rooms are well appointed, the food is delicious, and the price is very reasonable. With views at the buffet breakfast that overlook Kuta reef.
My new favourite hotel in Tuban.
title: Hidden gem

text:
After arriving at midnight, we were greeted by friendly staff and fresh fruit (which we popped in the fridge for the next day). The hotel is spotless and very modern. Towel animals on the bed were cute and the kids loved them. The beds and pillows are huge. 

It is close to the airport so you are not stuck in traffic. Transfers to the airport on departure are also offered for free.

The pool is on the roof along with sun beds and umbrellas. It can get a bit windy but is still lovely. We sat up there and watched the planes take off and land for ages. Food and drinks are easy to order from this area with a call button.

Breakfast is buffet with an amzing egg/waffle/pancake station.

The beach is across the road and about 30-40m away.

Heaps of cafes, restaurants and shopping in this area and Lippo Mall is just around the corner.

The only negative is the wi-fi, it kept dropping out but was suitable for our requirements.

We will definately be returning here on our next trip.
title: Location Location Location

text:
Modern hotel  with friendly caring staff. 

Greeted with fresh fruit on arrival. Room not ready (we were early) but safe area to store luggage and could  use  facilities.,,

Rooms (king deluxe) were clean, modern  and comfortable - serviced daily. Loved the bathroom, huge bed and pillows! 

Wifi was okay - kept dropping out. Could hear road noise from 2nd floor. 

Great food and view from roof top restaurant- sunset views amazing. Waiters  were awesome. 

Roof top pool had sun beds and shade umbrellas. Could order drinks and food at pool and charge to room or pay. Was breezy but nice on hot day. Fun place to watch planes...

Enjoyed the pancake/waffle area at breakfast. 

Sulis Spa was awesome! Definitely recommend a visit.

Beach a very short walk away. Was okay - but people keep coming up trying to sell stuff. Pool a better option. 

Hotel close to airport with free ride to airport when leaving.

Would definitely recommend and stay again! Thanks Sulis!
title: Lovely modern hotel!

text: Just spent our last night here after a week in a villa in seminyak,booked because of the courtesy lift 5mins away to the airport,across the road from the beach,walk 2mins to all the cheap massages,restauarnts etc bali is renowned for.We loved the roof top pool where you can press the service button behind the sun lounges to have food and drinks ordered and delivered.Restauarant looks directly over the beach and some of the best sunsets around.We had a 1am flight so left at 1030pm,kindly the hotel delivered take away breakfast provisions to our room which was very thoughtful.Room was large,great beds,bathroom and facilties were great.A/C was cold and room smelt nice which can be rare in bali.Had a bround floor room which was quiet,no noise with glass doors shut.Good value stay and Will return for a longer stay next trip...
title: Great location

text: This has been my 3rd stay at the Sulis hotel and have loved it each time. I’m not the biggest fan of Kuta at night as it is very busy but I am quite happy just to stay in at night enjoying room service and watching a good movie on the flat screen tv or lounging by the pool which has an incredible 360 view of the beach and other resorts. Roof top pool with food and drink service. The Sulis beach is less than five minutes walking distance. I will go mad if I am offered one more sarong though haha. The hotel have great prices when using the spa rooms. I will absolutely stay there again..
title: Amazing breakfast buffets

text:
Very comfortable hotel surrounded by lush greenery. 
Just down a bit is the Kuta beach. And a short walk to the main town district. 
Staff are incredibly helpful especially in stressful situations ( which we unfortunately experienced for ourselves ) the staff went above and beyond to assisting us. 

-The roof top pool is trendy and comfortable. 
-Great food and drink at the roof top restaurant. 
-Great room service menu selection. 
-Fantastic free breakfast buffet with selections alternating daily. 

Spa staff will offer free 5 min massage in hopes to book you in for a spa treatment - which you really should take advantage of😜 

Am looking forward to my next visit.
title: Holiday haven

text: Stumbled across this hotel as we walked nearby. Found a magnificent rooftop restaurant with a view of the sea and surrounding area including watching the planes coming in to Kuta. The food was delicious, generous serves at very affordable prices. We went back after a couple of days and were not disappointed. This hotel is only 18 months old and is still establishing itself in the area. Well worth a visit! The staff were very friendly.
title: Lovely Lunch!

text: Went to Bali for a family vacation and stayed here for 6 days. Hotel was exceptionally clean and comfortable with nice pool, spa and rooftop restaurant. Went to spa with a 4 hrs long family package with our daughter (13) and son (7). It was an amazing experience for all of us. The therapists were extremely professional and friendly. We've enjoyed all the segments. Value for money fully ensured.
title: Comfortable hotel, great spa

text: My friends and I booked  in for treatments as we had a few hours to spare between checking out of our villa and flying home. The facilities and staff were incredible, especially so given the price! Within our group we had a range of massages, manicures and pedicures and none of us has a bad word to say. The treatments were excellent, the staff made us so comfortable (I actually fell asleep during my pedicure!) and the little touches such as drinks and introductory foot massage were great.
title: Spa treatments

text: A hotel to revisit.  High level of service and customer care.  Loved the outlook from restaurant and upper level.  Awesome mattress and attention to detail.  Free transport to the airport even gave me a breakfast box as I checked out at 5am.  A 5 day stay with friends in an adjoining room and a very nice change from Seminyak and the inflated prices of that area.  Highly recommend and enjoy your stay.
title: STAY HERE

text:
So glad we found the Sulis!  It was recommended by friends who had stayed there previously and they weren't wrong - its fantastic.
It is perfect for families who surf as it is located directly opposite where the boats leave for Kuta reef surfing.
The rooms are well sized, clean and very comfortable.
The kids loved the roof top pool as well.
Food was great - we had breakfast included and the buffet was ample and delicious.
The staff were friendly, ameniable and welcoming.
Would definitely stay again.
Thanks Sulis!
title: Great spot!

text: Wonderful experience in the spa. The massages are great but times seems taken up with other things. If I book a 1.5 hr massage that’s what I want.  Because a foot treatment is included in each massage if you book more than one treatment you seem to loose about 15 mins.
title: Great Spa

owner_response.text:
Dear Donna,

Commencing time starts from Footbath/ foot massage at the front. Please be reminded that footbath is not always included in our spa treatments as indicated in the spa menu. 

In case, 2 different treatments are booked and footbath is included in both treatments, the massage session is extended in exchange of the lost footbath in one of the treatments.

If further information is required, please feel free to consult with the Spa Supervisor before commencing your spa treatment(s). Thanks.

Best regards,

ANNIE
Spa Manager and Chief Trainer
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I've stayed for 2 nights started on 30th May, with my family, room space are huge wide and clean, we stayed in family room. Overall the rooms are comfort for us, but when we try the breakfast it was shocked a bit cause I think they will provide a good breakfast buffet style, but unfortunately I was wrong.. It is just not worth with the price, and the staff are not well trained for how to serve guests.. Hope the management could improve the F & B department and the Staff Hospitality Services towards guests.. Not all guest are never been in Hotelier Services, cause Bali is a wonderful place, don't use "commonly in Bali" words to defense your excuses to customers.. Thank you and have a good day..
title: Room hotels are nice, Foods are not match with the price and hotel stars

owner_response.text:
We're sorry to learn that your breakfast experience was less than expected. Please feel free to reach out to me by email for your details and how you would like us to improve. In view of the price, breakfast is actually free of charge for those registered in the room booking respectively.

Despite the above, we are glad to learn that you loved your room being spacious, clean and comfortable. Hopefully we will have another opportunity of hosting you again on your next Bali holiday.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The Sulis was clean, reasonably priced and very close to the boats out to Kuta reef! Great sized rooms and very clean! Close to great set of shops and very close to the beach! We will definitely stay there again!
title: Great place to stay!

text: The staff explained we were early but would have our room ready asap before check in and they did.The room was clean bathroom was excellent bigger room than expected.the location was quiet close to the beach.The pool area was relaxing ordering drinks was fast and staff were very pleasant and friendly,very clean and friendly hotel to stay highly recomended
title: The staff were very pleasant on our arrival we felt the relaxing atmosphere instantly the hotel was very clean pool

text: We came for a visit to the Sulis to look at the rooms on offer for our next stay..  We were shown all the room types and were very impressed.  We also had dinner on the roof top one night and the meal was outstanding.. But the highlight of this hotel was the Spa.. It was amazing.  In fact it was that good that my sister and I  went there twice. The staff were amazing at check in and the massage staff were just lovely making sure you were comfortable. The place is beautifully clean and all equipment used is cleaned.   This was my first visit to Sulis spa and will definitely not be my last.   Thank you Sulis
title: The Sulis Spa

text:
Stayed here for 10 days as my husband was on a Bali golf trip. Very happy with our stay . Friendly and welcoming staff and very clean hotel. Quiet location as it is in Tuban , but only a 5 min walk and you are at the Luma mall and shops. Great eating places only mins walk as well. Their spa is amazingly well priced for a hotel spa.The breakfast buffet is good and rooftop restaurant is a great place to watch sun go down and food is fabulous 
Will def be back
title: Wonderful Hotel

text:
We stayed here in February 2019 and recommended it as an option for our wedding guest in May 2019. Everyone who took up this option were delighted with the hotel (including my daughters). The rooms were clean and spacious. The rooftop pool has that “I’m on top of the world” feeling. And the restaurant on the 4th & 5th floors have fantastic sunset views - great for a meals or just pre-dinner drinks. The staff are very helpful and friendly. 
I recommended it to my friends and they’ve enjoyed their stay and I’m sure they are recommending it to theirs
title: Fantastic value in Kuta

text: This hotel had everything our family needed.  The breakfast that was included in the rate was top class. The top floor swimming pool and dining area felt like a world away from busy kuta with its sea views. The room we had for our 2 adults and 2 kids had plenty of space with comfortable beds and pillows. The location is close to airport and close to the beach where you can get a boat to the reef to have a surf. My wife loved the massages and the boys loved the room service which were both cheap.   We will be back!
title: Great spot in kuta

text:
First of all, I rarely write down any comment in social media. I would only write down one when the experience either exceptionally good or exceptionally bad. 

We came to Sulis to visit our friend. The hotel is well maintained, the staffs are professional and corteous. On the first day we had a great experience. Disaster came when we went to the breakfast restaurant on the 2nd day. There were 3 adults and 1 child in our group. At the restaurant reception we surrendered the breakfast coupons to Ms. Yenny. Since we came to the restaurant on the previous day, we understood that extra guest will pay 100k for adult and 50k for children when take something from the buffet that was explained by Ms. Cathy. After finished breakfast, we asked how much we have to pay at the cashier. Ms. Yenny told me to pay for 1 adult and 1 child. I explained to her that I didn't take anything from the buffet because I was fasting. Yet she insisted that I have to pay. I asked what I had to pay for, she replied for entering the restaurant and sitting down on the chair. I was disgusted with her explanation. We exchanged arguments to a heated conversation...in front of other guests!!! (I am sorry for them to had ruin their breakfast time). She was very arrogant, aggresive, abusive and obviously doesn't know how to handle the situation. I refused to be a victim and demanded to meet Manager On Duty. Ms. Cathy finally met me and settled the issue professionally.

I found out that Ms. Yenny is the owner's sister. I was so surprise how a suppose respected person behaved like that. The most effective leadership is leading by example. She just failed to do so. Her staffs know guest relation away more than her!!!
title: Hotel Owner's Sister Acts Like a Thug

owner_response.text:
We’re sorry to learn about your unpleasant experience on your 2nd day at breakfast. According to Ms Cathy – our Assistant Restaurant Manager, there were quite a number of misunderstandings. 

First of all, Ms Yenny is not part of our hotel-restaurant management; she is a caretaker of the breakfast for coupons. Despite the fact being the owner's sister, Ms Yenny is neither a leader nor any member of management team within our establishment. 

Secondly, our 4th-floor restaurant is not a public area at breakfast time and hence, we expect everyone entering the restaurant for a seat to be our hotel guest (of which breakfast is included in the room being paid for). Presentation of a breakfast coupon is required as outlined in the room booking policy and advised upon check-in. Ms Yenny made sure that everyone was a registered hotel guest (according to the room registration we have for the day). As our hotel was on full occupancy, the breakfast was very busy and it must have been very difficult for our staff to always be on their watch ensuring no-eating for non-registered guest. Therefore, by all mean she is ought to ask for payment from any non-registered guest entering the premises (after all only a couple were registered in your room but 3 adults + 1 child came up for breakfast). 

Third, interestingly from your 1st day of visit at the restaurant (on the day before), you had understood that charges applied for extra guests and it was a great experience for everyone. On your 2nd visit, Ramadhan took place and you did not wish to eat but only to visit (as you’re fasting). We would have expected this mentioned to the staff or to Ms Yenny (or whoever was on the desk for the coupon check) on arrival. Unfortunately, despite a reminder from one of our service staff, you did not mention anything about your fasting throughout the breakfast time but only on your departure from the restaurant at the end of the breakfast time (although your friend actually agreed to pay for his breakfast).

Mostly our hotel guests make friends in Bali (or at least a driver). In fact, we have designated several areas in the hotel for friendly visitation in the morning such as lobby and rooftop restaurant/bar. The 4th-floor restaurant during breakfast time is definitely not advisable for friends visit as its area is quite limited (it is designated for hotel guests’ breakfast only from 7 am until 10 am) unless visitors are willing to pay for breakfast. This policy has been made since the hotel opened 2 years ago to ensure comfort for all hotel guests during breakfast from being over-crowded.

On housekeeping note, the provision of free breakfast is not transferable (as it comes as a compliment with the room payment). This policy is written on the breakfast coupon, information card in your room and on the hotel's website under Booking Terms & Conditions.

Despite your 1-star rating, nevertheless I’m very glad to learn that you reviewed the hotel & restaurant being well maintained with professional & courteous staff. Your special mention to Ms Cathy (Asst. Restaurant Manager) being professional in handling the heated situation that morning was also much appreciated. 

With best regards, 

PAULUS WIBOWO 
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We commend the employees of Sulis Hotel. From the reception staff to the spa workers, to the swimming pool attendants and waiters. We were allowed early check in at 10:30 AM. The  services were outstanding specially to Ms. Prada of the spa. I and my daughters availed of their full package. We  were also given free airport transfer when its time to go back to the airport. We also had our snacks and dinner at the hotel. The servings were big and the price was affordable. We just hope the girl staff at the egg station followed the attitude of her co workers.
title: Very Good Customer Service

owner_response.text:
Thanks for your recent stay and taking time to write a lovely feedback. Your commendation praising the staff (reception, spa, pool attendants, waiters) was much appreciated especially your mention to Prada for her outstanding services. 

The young girl at the breakfast egg station is actually not the hotel staff but a secondary student from a nearby school. She had been with us for over a month as a kitchen trainee for 3 months which is part of her school curriculum. Please accept our apology for her seemingly subpar attitude (actually she is very nice but extremely jumpy with foreigners). We will certainly train her further for better communication skills before her training ends within these couple of weeks.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This is a very good hotel. Spacious rooms and bathroom. Very clean. Bed is with very thick matrass, sleeps good. Top floor swimmingpool, quiet especially in the morning. Good view to the ocean. For us also important, really close to the airport. You can see it from the rooftop. Food is good, good prices. Nice and helpful staff
title: Super hotel

text:
What a great hotel experience!
Great staff, enormous rooms, the comfiest beds, cleaning service every day, awesome pool, great restaurant, excellent location. 

We stayed for a week with two teens and we all loved it. 
The restaurant is very reasonably priced, food is good & staff very attentive. 

Spa staff were great. Free 5 min massages while you’re waiting for your fold to arrive at restaurant too. 
We had a foot massage and thoroughly enjoyed it. Such beautiful facilities & atmosphere. 

I think the only negative for me was we were on the 2nd floor overlooking the street & the dogs barking at night drove us crazy. I would opt for a room on the other side next time.
title: Fab hotel in a nice, quiet location

text:
I and my wife stayed in this hotel's Room No:- 3208 for five nights from 3rd to 7th April, 2019. We checked out on 8th. Most of the things about this hotel are great. The room allotted to us was super spacious, neat and clean, with all amenities provided inside. The balcony of the room faced the villas of the next door hotel and the scenery from there was beautiful. All our requirements were tended to promptly. The most salient feature of this hotel is that it is situated at a very quiet and peaceful location just opposite the southern end of the beach. This part of the beach is not well maintained but the quiet surroundings are very pleasing and relaxing. Also the hotel is just a 10 to 15 minutes drive from the bali international airport which is very convenient for the tourists. The staff of this hotel is marvellous, always smiling and greeting the guests every time. The spa of the hotel offers very good therapies at reasonable rates. I and my wife took a 5 hour spa therapy and were more than happy with the service received.

Now for the negatives. 1) The biggest drawback of this hotel is that it doesn't serve any vegetarian fare. Every morning for 5 days, during the breakfast time, we went to their 4th floor restaurant only to find that there was not a single vegetarian dish available there. Even the bread contained egg. Fortunately, we were knowing that in Bali, majority of the hotels and restaurants serve non veg fare only and hence we had brought our vegetarian snacks from India and were carrying it along. Also thankfully, we had already confirmed our food package of seven days consisting of lunch and dinner with a restaurant named "Kailash Parbat" which serves only vegetarian fare and thankfully it was just a five minutes walk from this hotel. The problem was that they open at 11 in the morning and hence having breakfast there was out of question. My only suggestion to the management of this hotel is to at least keep 3 to 4 vegetarian items in their food menu so that the vegetarians don't feel unwelcome. 

After staying in this hotel for five days, we stayed at a villa in Rama Beach Resort which is just adjacent to this hotel and boy, we were so happy to see some 4 to 5 vegetarian items in their breakfast menu. This means that many hotels do serve vegetarian fare too. 

I hope that this hotel's management pays heed to my suggestion and when I visit Bali next time, which I definitely plan to, I get to see vegetarian food served too at this hotel or else unfortunately, I would have to choose some other hotel to stay. 

Regards.
title: Nice hotel but not good for vegetarians.

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your recent stay and writing a lovely feedback.

With regret, we don't have Indian breakfasts and generally very few vegetarians stay in the hotel. Majority our patrons are Europeans (although East Asians are often seen too during Asian holidays). 

However, a number of popular breakfast items in our buffet have no meat nor egg such as Garlic Buttered Mushrooms, Baked Tomatoes, Asian Porridge, Rolled Oats Porridge, Baked Beans, Pastas, Hashbrown Potatoes, Green Salad, Balinese desserts, and of course, seasonal fresh fruits. Nevertheless, if you have certain diet restrictions, please feel free to speak to Restaurant Manager. He/she will be more than happy to coordinate with the chef-on-duty to cater for your needs (as long as the ingredients are readily available).
 
Should you need further information or assistance for your future stay, please feel free to reach out to me too. Thanks again and I'm glad that you find vegetarian breakfasts at next door resort.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The Sulis Hotel (our second stay) was a pleasure to visit. The location, rooms, staff, restaurants, breakfast, and Spa were very good value. 
The Rooftop Pool is immaculate and offers great views. As I swim train in Australia the pool is always important when I chose accomodation.We found the standard of service and food in the restaurant to be authentic and very affordable. The Breakfast is fresh and varied and very organised.
A massage by Spa therapist Srinata was the best I have ever had! I had a back pain issue and she skilfully relieved the pain making walking easier for me. The Spa is beautifully appointed and has lovely fragrance and gentle background music.
Our experience once again was that every staff member no matter their position is friendly and helpful.
We highly recommend The  Sulis Hotel especially to those who like the Segarra area in Tuban close to the Airport.
title: 50h Wedding Anniversary Holiday.

text: Friendly efficient staff, very clean room and great pool area.  The hotel is well positoned the room a good size, quiet airconditioning and plenty of hot water.  The staff are very friendly and very willing to help.
title: Great staff, good location

text: From the moment we arrived from airport (which is only 10 mins max away), we felt at home.  Receptionists are really friendly and efficient.  Loved the icy cold cloth and drink on arrival.  Room is spotless and huge.  Air con is excellent and the showers are powerful.  Beds are huge and super comfy! So nice having an outdoor area and a permanent mossie coil going! The rooftop pool is lovely and relaxing.  Plenty of seating and the pool is crystal clear.  I had a 90 min Balinese massage and it was amazing (all for $20), sooo good.  Nothing was too much trouble and always a smiling face.  Food is really good.  Would highly recommend this place if you want a home away from home at a good price.  Enjoy.
title: Great place to relax!

text: Two restaurants, 4th floor restaurant for rainy days and roof top (5th floor) open restaurant both with commanding views of Jerman and Kuta beaches.  On a clear day a wonderful distant view of Mt. Batur and surrounding mountains can be seen.  Sunsets on a clear day with little of no clouds are a great photo opportunity providing a lovely backdrop for cocktails and a relaxing meal.  Service is pleasant and food/ drink prices are very reasonable.  We did not stay at the Sulis but ate at both 4th and roof top restaurants 5 times during our long stay in the Kuta area.  Meals are prepared on the 4th floor open kitchen by smiling staff and from time to time at the roof top (5th floor) grill.  The menu covers both simple Western and Indonesian options.  I enjoy fresh fish and when the cook gets it right both the Mahi Mahi and Tuna are wonderful.  The serving is 250g and reasonably priced for the equivalent of $6.00 and $7.50 CDN.  Best way for both of these fish is to be grilled rare and you will get close to medium.  Best when rare.  The chicken dishes are large portions and can be shared between two or one hungry guest.  Pasta is not home made but it is cooked a la dent and their cream sauce is not over powering.  The garlic and oil spaghetti got the approval from our chef friend and it looked wonderful.  He did not share:) We and our friends sampled most of the menu over the multiple visits and recommend this restaurant for a visit.  Thumbs up, we will return next year.
title: Restaurant review

text:
We stayed for 2 nights as the hotel was only a 10 minute drive from the airport. We arrived at 2am so we were checked in by security - they weren’t very welcoming & we had to make our own way to the room with our luggage. 

The room was as described & the AC was good. Breakfast was a buffet, the food was ok but nothing amazing. 

The rooftop was lovely & you could opt to dine in this area.

Staff throughout the hotel were very friendly with the exception of reception but I’m not sure whether this was just due to a language barrier.

The hotel spot was great for hiring a boat for the good surf spots, unfortunately the hotel does not allow you to take your surf boards to the room so it was a tad annoying having to retrieve & return to security every time - based on this we probably wouldn’t return to Sulis.
title: 2 night stay

owner_response.text:
We're sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with our security; they had always been known being helpful with porter service especially at night as they are in-charge for Reception desk. It seems there was a problem with communication (they went through English training sessions but evidently not good enough).

Surfboards can always be taken to your room but you must use stairs if your room is on upper floor (you can't use elevator for your surfboards). Ideally, a ground-floor room should have been booked so you would not need to climb stairs with your surfboards but straight to/from your terrace for room access. All ground-floor room has 2 entrance doors: one at corridor (like your room) and one at the terrace with small garden in front of it.

Ground-floor rooms are popular with surfing patrons and they keep coming back to stay with us. Waves at Airport Reef surf spots can be checked from restaurant during breakfast and rooftop pool (if better view is needed).

We thank you for staying with us and hopefully we will have another opportunity of hosting you again in near future. Please reach out to me should you need further information. Thanks again.

Best regards,

Paulus / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I've been reluctant to write this review, even after staying with the Sulis regularly over the past 18 months or so....because I'm selfish. I don't want anyone to know about the spotless spacious rooms or their comfortable beds. I want that lovely breezy ocean view from the 5th floor pool deck all to myself. I want the spa and their amazing staff to be permanently available for me to walk in any time I want to be pampered. I don't want anyone else to be in queue in front of me for my freshly made omelette at breakfast. I want this place to be my personal haven! But I have come to realise that I cannot, on my salary, be their only guest. So share I must, so that they may thrive and I can stay with them for many decades more to come - not that they actually need any help from me to achieve this! 

So what can you expect when you arrive? Big smiles and polite friendly greetings. Staff that do everything they can to accomodate a reasonable request. Fully functional air conditioning and hot water systems. Reasonably priced and tasty food for all your meals. A quiet nights sleep no matter which room you get, thanks to the double glazed windows leading to your private balcony. A respectable breakfast spread with an egg and pancake station (and if you want more variety than what they offer, perhaps you should have paid for a stay at a bigger commercial resort - not this exceptional little boutique hotel). A meticulously clean and relaxing spa with the most well trained staff.  A location that is just minutes from the airport and two shopping malls. A beach just a minutes walk from your doorstep. A free shuttle to get your to the airport when you must leave. And a bill that won't break your bank when you check out. 

And you'll likely find me lounging by the pool while you're there too. ;)
title: Great value for money

text: We enjoyed our stay. Our room was spotless and the bed comfy. The pool was lovely especially at night. Breakfast had everything we wanted. The massages were good with lovely clean facilities. We had a few meals at the restaurant and they were nice - fantastic setting especially at sunset. We walked from the airport - takes about 15 mins and was very easy. The hotel offers a complimentary shuttle back to the airport.  I would stay here again and recommend to friends but price would be the determining factor.
title: A lovely hotel

text:
Super high CP Value. Spacious and clean room, very helpful and friendly staff, super good Spa. The bed is a bit too high but still comfortable. Breakfast is included, kind of basic but enough to be full. The lobby is a bit too hot, it would be great if more fans are provided. 
Overall, worth to stay!!
title: High CP Value

text:
We picked up on the Sulis Beach by accident, when booking another hotel in Tuban
The hotel was discounted due to off season - we booked a room for family - 2 adults & 2 children. What we got was beyond expectation - A beautiful clean spacious room 5* - We were facing the street which was amusing to watch the world go by - the food at this hotel is way above standard with a standard price. We all loved the swimming pool on the roof and the open restaurant on the 4th floor. If you are a plane buff this is the place for you - watching the big planes taking off or landing from the restaurant or the pool area is magic. Also this has a bit of old Kuta Beach nostalgia on the beach with the fishing boats and local beach bars if you so desire.
title: Another Gem found in Tuban

text:
I arrived early at the hotel and the recep allowed me to check in (though they need to clean up the room very quickly) and even provided me with a garden view room since I requested for it. The room was so clean and the staffs were all so nice. I read in Trip advisor that their spa is a must try and so I did checked it out, and yeah it was so clean and so relaxing. The breakfast was just ok but thats not a minus point for me, I just got what I paid for so you cant expect much. Amidst the busy streets of Kuta, you can still find solitude at their rooftop pool. I stayed up at the poolside until late night watching the sky and feeling the cool breeze. 

If you are really looking for a true Bali feel accommodation maybe Sulis is not for you as the room is somehow modern. But if youre there for some beginners surfing (few surfing schools nearby which arrange hotel pick ups) then stay at Sulis. There are also nearby shops and restaurants and bars.  A simple hotel with very clean and comfortable rooms with friendly staffs, that is Sulis. 

And a shout out to the house keeping team for surprising me with a card on my birthday. Thanks for the effort :)
title: Amazing Stay

text: Hi I stayed for 3 nights at Sulis in family room. 1 x king and 2 singles the room was huge and very clean . Always found different animals on the bed from the towels made by housekeeping kids loved this. Breakfast at hotel was excellent (better than Sofitel) we ate on rooftop restaurant food was good and priced well. Staff are very friendly and professional. Check in easy and in room within 10 mins of arriving.They have some really good Spa packages and the private airconditioned spa rooms clean and beautiful. I will be returning next year to this lovely resort and staying longer.
title: Great hotel with good service

text:
The hotel is within walking distance to many simple restaurants, there is also a lippo mall nearby, about 10-15 minute slow walk. There is actually a bus services which is going loop in Bali tourist area, called Kuma, you may actually read it up and see the pricing.

The staff is very friendly and attentive. There is also free bus services to the airport, totally perfect if when you are leaving the place. Just need to inform the staff in advance.

There maybe quite a bit of mosquitoes around, so be prepared with insect repellents. The hotel room does have a mosquito incense in the balcony, do burn it if you decided to chill out at the balcony. 

And if you decided to do their massage and spa service, please do book in advance...
title: Good hotel with reasonable price

text: Close to the beach and malls at Kuta. affordable prices and good breakfast. swimmingpool at the rooftop. very friendly people. Big room with fridge and watercoocker to make koffie or tea. If you need anything.. just call and the service is with a smile. Spa available
title: Lovely place

text:
What a great little hotel this one is. We spent 7 nights here and would have to say as far as value for money is concerned it would be very hard to beat. 
We had a couple of minor things in the rooms that needed attention but were fixed very quickly. Breakfast is good but falls a bit short of fantastic due to some odd things on the menu like the Bacon wrapped vegetables and the sausages on scewers with funky sauces ( why not just have sausages and Bacon). Neither of these things are enough to deduct any points though.
Sulis biggest assett is its wonderful friendly staff, special mention would have to go to the cleaners as this was not only the cleanest place we went to in Bali but one of the cleanest places Ive been to anywhere.
title: Great little Hotel

text:
(+) Superb Balinese hospitality - reception was very welcoming, we were greeted with a small fruit platter on arrival. My wife and I stayed here for the last few days of our 2-week stay in Bali. We booked into a double room on the 3rd floor of the hotel. The room was modern, large, very clean and well-equipped with an excellent aircon, a safe, bottled water, bar fridge, a storage cupboard, satellite TV, adequate plug points, drying rack). The bathroom was large, with a hairdryer and extendable vanity mirror. The shower was large (shower gel and shampoo provided). Bathroom lighting was excellent. The king-size bed was very comfortable. The rooftop pool was large and well maintained (towels and loungers available), but strangely, the loungers/deck chairs have no cushions (also noted by other guests). Breakfast, lunch and dinner is provided (lunch, dinner @ additional cost) with a large variety of food/drinks on the lunch/dinner menu. Food quality was average to good (I tried the duck and lobster, which were both good, lobster slightly overdone). The breakfast was buffet-type with a decent (albeit small) range of food. The egg and waffle station was a hit (you could order omelettes with unlimited amount of fillings and waffles/pancakes with unlimited amount of toppings) and makes up for the small range of food in the buffet menu. There was also a coffee machine available. A special mention of the in-house spa: We booked the couples package and were hugely impressed by the service and facilities. A special thank you to Pendi and Indra who made our experience very special. The beach is located directly across the hotel. A bar and restaurant (Envy) can be found as you walk to the beach. The main Kuta beach is a 20 - 30min walk from the hotel. Taxi services also available outside the hotel (no Uber allowed). Free airport shuttle available (book this when you check-in). Overall, Sulis Hotel represents excellent value for money and is highly recommended.

(-) Our only major gripe was the loud sounds emanating from the floor above during the early hours of the morning. We found out that our room was directly underneath the dining area on the 4th floor, hence the noises came from the staff setting up the dining area. The WiFi was slow at times, but generally ok. No cushions on loungers/deck chairs at the pool area - uncomfortable to relax on. Food options may be limited during dinner as this is dependent on stock and number of guests. Service can be slow at times, but remember that you are on holiday!
title: “Fantastic, enjoyable, relaxing stay - will definitely be back!”

text: The hotel is situated right at the end of the busy Kuta street so it is not very noisy around but you can step out and just within km experience the night life of Kuta. We stayed the night we reached Bali before roaming around the island living in different places. It is quite close to the airport and serves the purpose of spending a night before transfer to another side of the island. The hotel is not about luxury but more of a clean, good place which serves the basic necessity.
title: Value for money stay near airport

text:
I am almost hesitant to write this review as I don't want to not be able to get in.
Myself and my husband and our adult daughter stayed for 7 nights and would love to still be there.
It is not a traditional hotel, however it has traditional staff and service. All the staff are very friendly and kind but still professional in their standards.
The lift is checked regularly, the pool area is checked regularly, the rooms are cleaned beautifully.
Breakfast is of a buffet variety and the food for other times of the day is very nice with excellent prices.
Cocktails are cheap so we did enjoy a few of those by the pool.
Non slip tiles in the shower floor, adaptors not needed as international plugs all around the walls.
Plenty of lights including night lights under the bedside tables.
Huge balcony.
Great air con and the rooms stay cool even when turned off for a while.
Tea and coffee and  bottles of water provided daily.
The hotel does your laundry beautifully. It does cost more then the street and we did have instructions such as hang dry and cold water etc but my dresses came back on hangers and everything was pressed and lovely.
The hotel has its own spa in the case of a bit of pampering, for us it was the last day that we chose this. otherwise there are spas and plenty of warungs and mini marts in the 2 side streets. They lead to Lippo mall at the front and that was very handy and has a supermarket and movie cinema.
It's a $3 taxi ride to the main centre of Kuta or legian though you can walk up the beach boardwalk or road..
The hotel is right next to the beach and from the pool deck the views of the ocean are amazing. We loved watching the planes come and go.
There is also a little play ground.
Plenty of gardens in surrounding streets and hotels that you can view and we loved watching the squirrels play in them.
They have security and they do their job well although I do wish they would chase the group of street dogs away that occasionally fought.
There are a list of rules in your room that they ask of you, I did read one complaint on here however I think its fair. They are trying to keep the hotel new so its comfortable for us guests.
They take pride in the hotel and its lovely.
Some of the rules are keeping fresh tattoo ink off the bed sheets and towels, other stuff like sunscreen oil etc. So its not hard to shower before bed.
If you are unloading shopping onto the bed, put it and your bag on a sarong or a towel. It's not hard. You would do the same at home.
Thank you Sulis for making our stay so wonderful and making me want to be back there again already.
Until next time. Sumpai Jumpa Lagi.
title: Our new place to stay

text:
Luxurious style bedrooms . Huge . I booked a family room .They had an oversized King bed and a single and also a double bed .All for $54 approx . Obviously off season . But stll . Location was ver good . 2 minute walk from the beach . They had a top ldeck swimming pool ..nice feature with panoramic views .
Breakfast buffet was ok to good .
Didn't like the fact you had to pay extra if you wanted a portion of bacon that wasn't on the buffet .
Rooms were relatively quiet except for stray dog fights at night outside the hotel . I would have thought the hotel could've chased them away . Don't expect traditional balinese style anywhere in the hotel ,which I missed . Could be a hotel room in any part of the world . Would stay there again because of location. However if a more traditional one was available close by I would go there . (personal preference ) Staff were friendly . All in all was a clean functional hotel without the charm .
title: Sulis Beach and Spa Hotel

text: Wonderful stay. Very friendly staff. Very close to the beach and the Kuta town area. Beautiful view from the hotel. Booking was smooth and the room was very clean and had everything from nice comfy bed, large bathroom,hot water, balcony with a view.. and ofcourse tasty  breakfast with lot of choices. Highly recommended.
title: Wonderful stay..

text: I really enjoyed my stay here. From arrival to departure the staff were great. Good room, comfy bed. The view at breakfast was great, food was good. Short walk straight down to a nice quiet beach. I would stay here again without hesitation.
title: Great Hotel

text: We are still here now and this is a very good hotel, with very good facilities. Our room (family room) is large and the beds are very comfortable, the bathroom facilities are exceptional. The room is very clean and new. There is a large balcony and a full size fridge. Toiletry supplied are of a good standard. Facilities at the hotel are very good, with a very nice rooftop pool. The room is so comfortable, my husband and 2 kids love it so much and they just want to stay in the room for rest, refused to go anywhere 😂. Most of staffs are very polite and friendly. The hotel location is very good, near to beach and Lippo Mall. We love this hotel so much and surely will stay here again for next visit.
title: Wonderful hotel and value for money

text:
Good hotel, almost got a 5 star, but needs some improvement.

We gave this hotel a shot because of it's good location, cheap restaurant with a great view, and larger sized rooms. We had a good stay, but a few small details made it less than perfect score.

The good:
- Rooms are BIG, redone very nicely, clean and modern.
- They have great plugs all over the room, which is so appreciated for long term travellers like me
- Full length mirror on the door! Very nice!
- Beautiful big floor to ceiling windows.
- Big fridge. Actually the biggest fridge we've seen at a hotel in Bali before
- Cheap restaurant with stunning views and great sunsets
- Very attentive reception desk staff who are super helpful, remember names, and eager to please
- Great prices for spa treatments, considering it's in a hotel
- Breakfast spread is really good. So are the custom things you can order like omelettes and waffles. 
- Location. You can walk to almost anything you like. The beach, Lippo Mall, Discovery Mall, markets, shops, spas, etc. Right in the heart of Tuban/Kuta. 

Needs improvement:
- The RULES. It seemed like everywhere you look there were rules printed. I have never seen so many rules and regulations about every little detail all the time. I know they are a family owned hotel, but it's overkill. I want to relax, not be inundated with dozens of rules all the time.
- The pool towels being in the rooms and not at the pool. I didn't like having to bring back wet pool towels and needing to re-use wet ones if I went back to the pool.
- It's hard to get service at the pool and it takes a while. Also the servers are over-stretched between the restaurant and the pool.
- my 2nd massage. The first massage I had was AMAZING. 10/10 perfect! I went again for 90 minutes and had a different woman and it was so awkward! She kept falling ASLEEP on me while she was massaging me. It was horrible and super uncomfortable. I actually ran out of the room when the massage was done, as I was too creeped out to say anything. 

All in all, it was a good stay and I appreciate how much effort they put into their hotel. You can see they care about hospitality, but their paranoia and rules are a little overkill for vacationers. (kind of a buzz kill)
title: Good value near the beach

owner_response.text:
Thanks for sharing your feedback - both positives and negatives for further improvement. We've brought up your details to respective teams for further staff training and improvements.

As for written rules, we often had issues with travelers from specific countries/nationalities of which they confronted the staff for not having them in writing. Those written rules were the "common" issues with these travelers.

We have Comfort Guarantee printed on the spa counter as we'd like to give our best to pamper you. Had you mentioned your discomfort with your 2nd massage within 15 minutes after commencing, we would have replaced the therapist or refunded your payment at once. Should you have the chance to visit Kuta again in near future to have another 90-minute of pampering time, please let us know in advance (to gm@greenbali.com) so a massage session can be arranged specially for you with no extra charge.

If you have other suggestions, please feel free to email your details (to gm@greenbali.com) and let us know how we can improve. Hopefully you’ll give us another chance of having you again in near future. Thanks again 

P.S. Your lovely feedback for our restaurant (on separate review page) was much appreciated; we can't thank you enough for your frequent visits (12 times during your hotel stay) and made the restaurant team so delighted.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We arrived late at night and were greeted by the night staff and shown to our room overlooking the gardens of the hotel next door from the balcony. The room was very spacious and clean. The bathroom ensuite large and bright with a great shower. The next morning the views to the north were amazing (we were on the 3rd floor), over the ocean around to the mountains. The included buffet breakfast was on the next floor, complete with egg station and asian and western food. The outlook from there is west overlooking the beach about 200 meters away. However it is open plan so really 180 deg vista south to airport north to mountains. Then we went to the top floor with the open-air resto, and up some stairs to the pool level. From there 360 deg views.Great pool with easy access and food/drink call bell, also a wheelchair lift. We ate there a few times watching the sunsets and the planes leaving. Simple menu with cheap prices. Great family hotel. Overall a great week without breaking the bank.
title: Wonderful week at Sulis

text: Got this place at a great price, very glad we did. Enjoyed there, will return for sure. The breakfast buffet is good. Roof top pool is a great hang out. Located in sth Kuta, not far to walk to shops..
title: Very comfortable place to stay

text: My family and I had 6 nights in a family room last week. Having visited bali many times before, I think the Sulis hotel was brilliant. Beautifully clean, room cleaned each day, fresh towels,kind staff who are eager to please. The spa and their prices are excellent, one and a half hours of pampering for around 25 Aussie dollars. I really could not fault it and we will be returning.
title: Great hotel

text: Great place for a massage,check out the different packages on offer for massages.Very clean and staff are friendly and very caring.Packages are reasonably priced.Massage rooms are quite and very spacious.
title: Delightful Massage

text:
Sulis Beach Hotel is a 3 star Hotel. 
Lots of Warungs close by serving fantastic food . 
The beach is a 2 minute walk . 
No chairs to relax on or sun bake . 
It needs to be cleaned up ! 
The pool area at the hotel does have an amazing view. The sunsets are really nice and much more comfortable to enjoy the view. 
The breakfast at Sulis beach was average. 
Coffee- terrible. 
The egg station was nice ! 
Room service , I only tried the once . 
I ordered a basic club sandwich . Arrived super fast . It was OK . The food is Not the same standard as the Febris , their sister Hotel. 
Room was large spacious and comfortable.
Great shower and A/C 
Comfy beds. 
Close to the airport with free transfer. 
Good Hotel for a few nights .
title: Sulis Beach Hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear "ABee711"

Thanks for your recent visit after staying at our sister hotel FEBRI'S and taking time to write a feedback. Indeed, both hotels are designed and operated with different concepts: Sulis is a leisure hotel while Febri's is more of a holiday resort due to its wide landscape with lush trees surrounding its pools.

The beach adjacent to the hotel has chairs from nearby restaurants; you can use their beach chairs but you will need to purchase drinks or food from them. If you wish to sun bake in the hotel, sun loungers are available around our rooftop swimming pool which is located on Level 5 with great view of the ocean.

Our breakfast coffee is supplied by Nestlé with their commercial self-serve coffee machines as commonly found at McDonald and Pizza Huts. Such coffee is part of our buffet breakfast which is available for free during breakfast for hotel guests. However, Cappuccino, Espresso or other gourmet coffees are available should you wish to purchase (price is outlined in the restaurant menu).

Despite the above, we are glad to learn that you love our fresh egg/waffle station with your breakfast selections, our guest room with its comfortable facilities and room service. Drop-off to airport can be availed for free but it must be ordered 1 day ahead so our Reception can prepare a van & driver for you.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Visited this at the end of just last september. With a relatively affordable price, this considered new hotel gave me a fast check in process, very spacey and comfortable bedroom. Room and Bathroom is in perfect condition, of course since they re a new hotel. Location is just a walk away from the beach, and just accross a 5 star resort which also possible for you to enjoy their fascility with some charge surely.. Bad thing I dont feel comfortable to enjoy is the minimalist buffet breakfast, its kind a boring for having the same menu for 2 days in a row, even from the breakfast spot you can have a little view of the ocean across..
title: Old Style Service by Local Chain Hotel

owner_response.text:
Dear Bp Yohanes S.

Many thanks for your recent stay. We're humbled to learn that you found the hotel being brand new with perfect condition although we've actually opened our doors for almost 2 years.

Your comment for our buffet breakfast was noted and we'd have appreciated if you spoke to the Restaurant Manager about the dishes you'd like to have (so they can be prepared ahead of time). In view of the number of available rooms and affordable price while breakfast is always included in the room, our daily buffet is wide enough with various Asians and Western selections including fresh daily croissants with toaster, made-to-order eggs & waffles station. We even avail rolled-oat porridge and soup daily for those with diet restrictions...!

Should you need information on daily details of our buffet breakfast, they are outlined in the hotel's official webpage under RESTAURANT (as we change varieties of hot food everyday).

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: First and most important is the lovely Sri on reception, so helpful and charming. A good hotel, standards sliding a bit and becoming a little overpriced, standard for Indonesia. Will I visit again? yes but only with big discount i.e the 240 day advance price. thank you Sulis and thank you Sri
title: good hotel, on the slide a little bit

text: We went to this hotel for meals three days in  a row as the restaurant food was tasty and the service was excellent. The restaurant is on two levels: on the rooftop and the next floor down. Therefore, if the wind is too cold on the rooftop one can move down to the next floor which is more sheltered. The toilet facilities are the cleanest we have seen anywhere in the world and there is a swimming pool on the rooftop. The menu is wide-ranging from french fries to food more fitting for a sophisticated palate! Prices are cheap compared with those in New Zealand.  Garlic prawns with all the trimmings cost 150,000 rupiah ($NZ15), as did fillet mignon. By ordering the aforementioned food we received two free plates of french fries.Otherwise a plate of french fries costs 30,000 rupiah ($NZ3). A mojito (cocktail) cost 60,000 rupiah ($NZ6). In New Zealand I would pay five times that price for  a mojito! I have quoted just some examples but all the meals were tasty! Although the atmosphere in the restaurant is a bit stark, the water views are breathtaking. We had a table for four (for two of us) but there were many long trestle tables which were not particularly attractive. However, we did have a look around the hotel as we were rather impressed. The reception staff were very helpful. If we go to Kuta again we will stay at Suli's.
title: Rooftop restaurant tasty food and lovely water views

text: We usually start our Bali holiday, first few nights at the Febris, however this trip the Febris was priced higher than usual so I came across the sister hotel Sulis.   We booked a deluxe room, facing hotel next door/partial ocean view, king bed + roll away, the room was awesome I would rate the room itself 4/5*, clean, bed was comfortable, bathroom large, spotlessly cleaned daily and large balcony.  Breakfast is very similar to the Febris, a basic buffet breakfast. I love the complimentary massages at breakfast, so of course I had to book one at the spa and just like Febris spa, their treatments/service are amazing. We ate dinner one night at the restaurant, great views, food was good.  Pool on the roof top was quiet each day and we loved it, my only suggestion would be cushions on the lounge chairs!  Overall for what you pay I think the Sulis is excellent value.  We will definitely be back.
title: Sulis

text: We stayed on the third floor and the room was very fresh and clean and so was the bathroom! The bedding and towels always clean and white...! The roof top pool and surrounding area was always well maintained and the view of the beach was beautiful! The restaurant near the pool was a little bare and it wasn't very inviting which is a shame as it has a great view of the beach just lacked atmosphere. the breakfast was mid range, and the coffee awful, I would recommend that a better coffee facility is provided. We ordered coffee while by the pool and we were given a half cup of warm milk with something that tasted a little like coffee, we were told that they do not have a coffee machine. The staff were helpful and a young man by the name of Dian was always very friendly! We would recommend this hotel for its cleanliness and it is close by to Lippo Mall! We also had various massages that were good but we found the rooms a bit cold.. Our stay there was pleasant !
title: Very clean and spacious rooms!

text:
We're still here now and this is a good hotel, with very good facilities. The rooms are large the beds are very comfortable, the bathroom facilities are exceptional. There is a large balcony and a full size fridge. Toiletry supplied are of a good standard. Facilities at the hotel are very good, with a very nice rooftop pool. The food is good quality, with a very good buffet breakfast.The boys serving snacks and food  at the pool and the breakfast are always happy and smiling, as are all the cleaning staff. There is a lot of attention to small details in the design of the hotel that make your stay easier. It's a very short stroll to the beach, which isn't really the best. You really do need to bring beach shoes in order to navigate the dead, broken, lumps of coral at the water's edge, which you can't see as the waves break.Things that aren't so goid are; the kettle takes an age to boil.You can have a shower, get dried and blow dry your hair in the time it takes.The hotel is impersonal and a little soul less. There is no focal point, in terms of a bar area and everyone seems to be in transit. This means the hotel is lacking in any sort of atmosphere.Reception staff barely acknowledge you as you leave or return and there's no local information. Because of this I would not stay for more than a couple of nights. It has the feel of an airport hotel, although a very good one. Not really a holiday hotel, if you like to meet new people, as besides chatting over the toaster at breakfast, there is no oppurtunuty to do so.
Based on facilities I would have given 4, maybe even 5. But based on our holiday experience it's only a 3.
Dave & Lynn, U.K.
title: Nine day stay in Kuta.

owner_response.text:
Dear Dave & Lynn,

Thanks for choosing to stay with us. Your positive feedback on the hotel facilities, cleanliness and staff are noted with many thanks, as well as your negative feedback on the lack of atmosphere. 

Many of our guests stay over a week (in fact there are a few staying for over a month) but there are also many others who stay for 1 or 2 nights due to our close proximity to airport. While our hotel guests come from various backgrounds with many different nationalities, we'd be more than happy to receive suggestions on how to improve the hotel atmosphere.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
