We are regular visitors to Bali and found Sulis was wonderful, a very new and modern hotel with an amazing rooftop pool with great views looking over Bali.
The rooms were very spacious with a good sized balcony with ocean views and the king size bed was one of the most comfortable ones I  have slept in.
During our 10 night stay we ate at the rooftop restaurant 4 times and found the food and variety on the menu to be excellent.
The hotel also has a wonderful Spa providing facials, massages and body scrubs which was heavenly.
Also found all the staff to be very friendly and helpful in the hotel, especially Yenny who greeted us each morning at breakfast. 
We will definitely be back again soon...
title: Great New Hotel In Paradise!

text:
I stayed in a deluxe double ground floor room. Price was good but being 3 star you just get the room. Location was okay . I wouldn't stay here if I was here longer than 4 days.
Breakfast was very limited with no reasonable coffee, fruit was basic. It could have been better 
Rooms were clean and spacious. Staff were friendly. Amenities limited. Good location for surfing and beach.
Probably only stay here if doing short trip again. As price is good.
title: Short trip to meet son

text:
We recently stayed at The Sulis after arriving on a late night flight from Adelaide Australia. We were warmly welcomed even though it was past midnight. 
The rooms were very spacious and immaculately clean. Staff were wonderful, friendly with nothing being too much hassle. We loved that the restaurant menu that was available in room when wanted. The buffet breakfast was also great with a fair variety to choose from. 
We initially stayed 3 nights and after going to other accommodation we came back here for our last night. We loved where it was, close to a lovely beach (2 minutes), also many places around to eat and drink. Close to some fantastic local massages that are a must even if just your feet. Really loved our stay there!
title: Easy access to Airport and Great Value

text:
My last day in Bali, I stayed in this hotel. And as I know this hotel still quite new. Positive things that I can say about this hotel :
- Very spacious room and also they provide balcony for smoking area or just to relax with outside air
- Very clean hotel
- Delicious breakfast
- All the staffs are really friendly
- Free airport transfer
- Location is simply just in front of the beach
- Very nice rooftop area with outdoor swimming pool
- Very nice sunset view from the hotel rooftop

I only have 1 issue :
- I stayed in room 1105 on the 1st floor, i heard knocking sound from somewhere upstairs like several times in the middle of the night and it's quite annoying, not sure where the sounds came from.

But overall, I am really satisfied with this hotel, very recommended hotel to stay.
title: Great place to stay

text: Stayed only three nights as I was travelling around Bali, this is a very nice new hotel which is close to the beach and shopping Malls(2). The rooms are big with very comfortable beds,the bathrooms are huge and well equipped.The menu is limited, but what is on it is excellent and very reasonably priced, drinks are also reasonable.What I really liked was the thought given to the rooftop area, the lift takes you to the pool area,and although the pool is on a different level, there is an extra lift for wheelchairs, how thoughtful is that, the pool is also very accessible with ladders and steps.The staff are very friendly and efficient, nothing is too much trouble to them.Will definitely stay again.
title: THOUGHTFUL

text: Sulis Beach Hotel in Bali is nice hotel having big rooms and toilets with balcony. It is near to the airport and beach. Unfortunately, the Internet is so slow and It is difficult to open websites and applications as well as could not open many important websites such as citilink air and banks. Also, the breakfast is not enough choices.
title: Nice hotel with badly Internet

owner_response.text:
Dear "KRefaei"

Glad that our spacious guest rooms and hotel location meet to your liking. 

Your feedback on the slow wifi was noted and we've brought it up to the internet service provider for improvement. At times with many internet users at once, the internet becomes too slow for booking airlines and banks. Please rest assured that we are working on this so website surfing can be improved from your room.

GUEST COMPUTERS
A few computers in Reception office are available with fiber optic internet connection. Hotel guests are free to use them especially when the internet connection is insufficient.

BREAKFAST
As our breakfast is buffet; should you have special diet requirements, please feel free to communicate with the Restaurant Manager one day ahead. He/she will be more than happy to coordinate the kitchen team as long as the ingredients are readily available and the team know how to make it.

Please email me if further assistance or information is required so your future stay can be more comfortable. Thanks.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Friendly staff members.
Super clean rooms and grounds. 
Large room with comfortable bed. Uncluttered room fittings.
Excellent and reasonable priced spa with capable spa staff.
Restaurant : value for money menu but limited choices. Nice view of the sunset over the ocean.
Medium sized clean rooftop pool and pool area.
Family rooms face the ocean. Deluxe rooms face the street or the gardens of the next door hotel.
I had the street facing room. Occasional motor vehicle noise and dogs barking.
Plenty of transportation available. 
Three minutes walk to the beach. Streets nearby have plenty of shops. 
I enjoyed my relaxing and safe stay here. It was worth the money I paid and it had what I was looking for. 
Actually I cannot think of anything to complain about, even the street noise and dogs barking did not disturb my sleep.
This hotel will be on my list in my future travels to Bali.
title: Excellent value for money hotel.

text: We have been to the spa a couple of times now, it’s new, clean and very professional. The staff are great and very welcoming. The Hotel is still new but it’s in a nice location. Lunch was nice and the restaurant is on the 4th floor so view pretty nice as well. Excellent
title: The Spa is amazing!

text: Clean hotel with big rooms. Stayed in this hotel for 5 nights and really loved it. It is close to the beach and they serve good breakfast for free. Staffs are nice and pool is clean and big. The only downside was internet was little slow. Highly recommended!!!
title: Nice hotel and friendly staffs close to the beach

text: Our first time at this excellent hotel close to the beach and airport. The rooms are very spacious and clean the beds comfortable value for money. A shuttle runs between Sulis Hotel and sister Hotel Febris which is very convenient and is away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta. We will stay here again definetely.
title: Excellent Hotel

text: The hotel setup are simple and welcoming. Staff are friendly and helpful. Room is clean and spacious for the price offered. 2 minutes from the beach and 10 minutes from the airport. Shopping is within walking distant with plenty of local food available. The only short coming is, it's quite a walking distant from the entertainment area.
title: Clean and Spacious

text: 10 out of 10 fantastic place to stay rooms are large King size bed the ensuite is also large fridge is more than just a bar fridge very friendly staff breakfast included and very nice good range of food close to beach in Kuta but away from the hustle and bustle lippomart shopping centre a short walk away airport 10 min drive free airport shuttle at the end of your stay
title: Can’t fault this place

text: Suli's is beautiful looking hotel, very new and modern. Although me and my sister where amazed with the room and bathroom we where on the ground level has requested but the fumes from the road affected my sisters health. We asked to be moved and they explained that they didn't have any twin rooms on the garden view side of the hotel but offered to move us to their sister hotel Febri's which they did. I would thoroughly recommend this hotel to couples.
title: Beautiful Hotel

text:
We spent one night in this hotel in June 2018 and we were very pleased with the size, interior and cleanliness of the room. We did not expect to get a large, luxurious and super clean/shiny room, considering that this is a 3-star hotel. The lobby of the hotel has the typical 3-star hotel feel but the room feels like a 5-star hotel. Needless to say, we loved the room. 

The hotel is also within 5-minute walking to the brand new Lippo Mall where you could pretty much find everything you need there. 

The hotel provides a decent roof-top pool. However, since the pool is on the roof top, the weather could get really hot in the afternoon. They also provide a small playground are for kids. It has a unique swing that can also rotate 360 degrees while you are swinging on it. Our kids loved the swing and begged us to come back there just to play again with the swing. 

Breakfast at the hotel was OK. Actually, it was pretty good for a 3-star hotel. There were selections of fresh fruits, juices, yogurt, noodles, pasta, fried rice, vegetable and meat dishes. It would be great if they can add fresh salads. 

The hotel is about 100m away from the German Beach. Unfortunately, the beach is not well kept and littered with trash. It is not the hotel's fault that the beach is not pristine.
title: Excellent 3-star Hotel

photos.caption: The swing that can rotate 360 degrees

text:
Located in a hustle-free street, this hotel was recommended for visitors who wished for tranquility in hectic Kuta.
Only minutes away from the airport, the hotel provided also necessary facilities & amenities if you wish to stay in room.
The rooftop pool is excellent for viewing sunset.
Recommended if u wish to bring family!
title: Nice Hotel for Family Trip

text: We stayed for 3 nights in sep 2017. Fantastic stay. Excellent buffet breakfast. Wide spread with many options to eat. The owners sister used to personally stand and took care of guests at breakfast counter. Warm Welcome at reception with Friendly staff. Rooms sizes are good as it’s a newly built property hence everything well maintained. Rooftop pools gives a great view of sea and beaches. Evening and sunset socially great to watch from roof top at pool side along side few drinks. Perfect combination. We got a good deal on price so no regrets. Still prices are competitive. Must stay place at kuta. Only downside is it’s away from main kuta beach but u can always reach there in 15 mins walk... memorable stay at the property.. will  visit again
title: Amazing hotel with great value for money ,friendly staff, excellent breakfast

text: We stayed here for 2 weeks. After paying so little for this hotel, I was a shade worried what to expect, but all the reviews on TA were good, so let's see. Well what a wonderful hotel! It might not suite everyone if you want to be in the thick of the action, but we loved it. The staff here are the best, they can't do enough for you. The cleanliness is perfect, almost clinical. The room was great, the comfiest huge bed you could want for. A/C turned your room Baltic within seconds, well equipped with safe, universal plug sockets so you don't need adapters, cable TV, fridge, kettle, tea and coffee, water every day, a balcony with comfy chairs, just geat. Free breakfast was good, plenty of choice for us meat eaters, but if I had to be very critical didn't have a great choice for a vegetarian,  maybe  cheese as an option. The pool was perfect, plenty of sun loungers,  great views, call buttons to summons the waiters. Once again, being hyper critical a few chairs would have been good for those who like to sit in the shade? Restaurant was really good, and reasonable. We used it quite a bit over the stay. Happy hour is 16:00 to 18:00 where it's buy 2 get 1 free on cocktails and Bintang. I had a pedicure the first week which was really good! So to balance this review I once again need to be hyper critical.  Although it's only 50 metres from the beach,  the beach is not the best. Unfortunately it suffers from a lot of debris / litter washing up. The sad thing is the fishermen and merchants who operate from the beach don't even bother to collect this rubbish, I know I would if it affected my business. Saying that its only a short walk to the better, cleaner beaches. So that's it, a true, honest view of Sulis Beach hotel. And Oh yes, they gave us a free transfer back to the airport which is only 15 minutes drive, another benefit. Thanks for a great stay, we loved it here!
title: Amazing value, great hotel!

text:
Stayed at Sulis due to sister hotel being renovated, but was surprisingly happy with the stay and would now stay at this hotel over other. Only downfall in my eyes it needed at better bar and breakfast though nice got a little much after 11 days.

Rooms are sensational with large showers and comfortable beds

Well worth the stay, with very helpful staff and lovely peaceful surrounding area.
title: mr

text:
Excellent hotel with very clean light rooms. Great location. Swimming pool on the roof is fantastic and restaurant is very good. I will definitely be coming back!
The spa facilities at the hotel are extremely good with high standards for all the ladies that work there.
title: Raffles golf trip

text: Stayed here for three nights. The room was big great bed ver6 clean with lovely bathroom. All staff extremely friendly and helpful. Good break included and a short walk to busy town centre. Beach next to hotel was a little scruffy but pool mad3 up for this. I would highly recommend and would return myself
title: Great Friendly hotel with lovely roof top pool and good breakfast

text: Booked a family room for 3 of us. Very spacious and clean. Have seen welcome drinks in other places, but here it was welcome fruits. I like the way they maintain, no decorations, high end things... but all basic things were clean, tidy... There were no carpets( In many hotels they stink unless they are maintained well), ceramic flooring everywhere but spic and spike. Breakfast had too many choices and tasted good. Especially the egg station, too good.... Wife got a massage for an hour plus @ 20+ SGD and was more than happy. Staff were polite and helpful. Reasonably closer to all amenities. Reduction of a star is for the beach that is nearby, though it is not the hotel’s mistake. Dirtiest beach in the whole of Bali. Don’t choose this hotel if your priority is to enjoy a beach that is in the neighbourhood.
title: Clean and comfortable...

text:
We stayed a week at the Sulis. The rooms we had are large and lovely we were on the ground floor. With a sliding door and a couple of chairs we could sit outside. Large shower and bathroom. The staff are all lovely and help in any way needed. 
The breakfast is more than adequate with it being on the 4th floor with a beautiful view of the ocean. 
The only fault I can find with this hotel is the poor area it’s on the 5th floor it does have some shade but I feel it needs more because it’s on the roof and no greenery (it does have fake lawn) it s very hot, there’s also an area with tables and chairs you can sit have a drink and enjoy the view but late afternoon it’s in the full sun and you can’t sit there maybe some roll down blinds would help just until the sun starts to set because it is beautiful to look at from that height.
The hotel has an amazing spa. The girls are all friendly. It’s a really lovely experience. We stay in this area because we loved going to the Febri’s hotel spa. So when we found at the Sulis is owned by the same owner and the spa is the same we were. very happy to say the least. We would definitely stay at the Sulis again.
title: Great hotel

text:
What a delight to walk into the lobby with its beautiful blue marble floor and to see that same beautiful floor throughout the public areas and in the gorgeous rooftop swimming pool with its territorial view of Kuta and even Mt. Agung off in the distance!

The only criticism I have is that after reading about Bali’s beautiful beaches, we walked down a path to our nearby German Beach only to find it strewn with washed in garbage...with the gorgeous high end hotels in this area, why isn’t this beach cleaned up to perfection daily? 

The breakfast has a huge variety of foods every morning and the staff is polite and kind.

Lots of local Warung’s and small businesses in the immediate area!
title: Beautiful Sulis

owner_response.text:
Thanks for your lovely feedback. We’re glad that you enjoyed your Bali holiday and liked everything we had to offer at Sulis.

From December to March seasonal winds with heavy rainfalls on higher lands push the garbage onto Bali's south-westerly facing beaches at tourist hotspots like Jimbaran, Kuta, Legian, Seminyak and Canggu. While the garbage is mostly from elsewhere, such unpleasant daily scene unfortunately keeps coming every year with the worst piles found in the morning until cleared off by hundreds of cleaners from local government with help of hawkers and hotels along those beaches. The scene of garbage should gradually ease off as from May as the season changes with different wind direction and less rains.

During this season, attractions at southern side of Kuta are mostly found on the streets: local shops with cheap merchandises to posh boutique brands in air-conditioned shopping malls, many restaurants offering various gourmet styles, new theatres with latest box-office movies (Gold Class premier recliner is even available for $20 only), free outdoor concerts every evening with great audio systems and comfortable sofas. Travellers wanting a quality time with families or close friends can go to a number of water parks nearby: from the budget-price Circus Waterpark to luxurious Waterbom Park with beautiful gardens. The options are endless around here.
 
Should you need more information on activities around the area, please feel free to email me. Thanks.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The hotel style comprising statues and lovely paintings encourages to feel immersed in the Balinese culture. Welcome amenities included plenty of fruit.  Ideally located very close to DPS airport. Breakfast buffet was very average but nothing to complain of. We stayed here for 3 days and found the place spotless, safe and with all the amenities needed to enjoy a holiday in Bali. Rooms are large & clean. Toiletries and clean towels every day. Pool is on rooftop & really beautiful, it is nice for an early morning swim but got busy after breakfast. The room was spacious and air con was fabulous- well needed. Room was cleaned every day and was spotless when we returned from our adventures in Bali. The staff behind the reception were always lovely - Like every person we met in Bali very friendly people. It’s really nice to get quiet time and still only be a moments’ walk from the action. Good location &  nice place to stay
title: Sparkle Clean

text: Quite new very clean and pleasant surroundings. My therapist was great, very enjoyable couple of hours. Left walking on air. Good list of available treatments and prices very reasonable . Would recommend.
title: Good experience

text:
This was our 8th time in Bali, and the 5th and last hotel we stayed in for this 2 week trip.  We wish we had found this hotel 1st!  Our accommodations included 5 star accommodation in Berawa and Kuta yet this hotel was the stand out for its customer focus, friendliness, sleep quality, and overall quality of staff.  

The staff are exceptional.  A special mention to Ady(?) for his engaging manner and eagerness to exceed expectations when we ate at the rooftop restaurant area to watch the most beautiful sunset (make sure you try the delicious ribs!), and the lovely lady who took our reservation and organised breakfast boxes for us to take on the plane as we would not be there for our complimentary breakfast.  Also the driver who took us to the airport via a great shortcut he knew of to avoid the traffic bottleneck and get us to the airport in time.

And lastly the attentive service I received from the girl who did my spa treatment in the exceptionally clean and comfortable dedicated spa area.  I'm sorry I don't remember your name but I was too blissed out to take it in!

Our room on the 3rd floor was spotlessly clean, had great air con with own temperature control, was totally noise free due to quality sound proofing, and had the most luxuriously comfortable king bed that we didn't want to get out of.  I also need to mention the quality of the pillows - I always take my own pillow everywhere I travel due to a neck problem but their pillows were exceptional and for the first time I used a hotels pillows instead of my own!

The hotel is 1 minute walk to the beach area, and offers great views from the rooftop pool, bar and restaurant area.  It is about a 5 minute taxi ride or 20 min walk to Waterbom Park.  The hotel is tucked away from the usual cacaphony of noise and traffic bedlam of Kuta, but still close enough to easily access Kuta life too.

We have already been singing the praises of Sulis to our friends, it is an absolute gem of a hotel. We will definitely be back!

Sulis - keep up the great work, your efforts and those of your staff are recognised and greatly appreciated by your guests.
title: A Gem Find that Exceeded Expectations!! Exceptional Guest Focus from the Entire Hotel

photos.caption: Its a 1 minute walk to the beach
Out the front of Envy cocktail bar & restaurant, 100 m from Sulis
Sunset view from rooftop dining area
Sunset view from rooftop dining area
Rooftop dining - Coi pool along the entire front of the area with fish feeding 2 times a day

text: This hotel completely exceeded my expectations. Great location, accessible, not too busy and very close to the beach. The view from the room is very pleasing to the eyes, all green and fresh. Rooftop pool and dining is awesome. They also offer free shuttle to the airport which is a big plus. Would definitely come back to stay here on my next visit to Bali.
title: Wish to have stayed longer

text: While the first look of the hotel might put you in doubt of whether you have chosen the right hotel, wait till you enter your room. Room was huge and quite artistically done. Loved the decor and the lighting. We chose a partly ocean facing room. However breakfast lounge was amazing. You have the full view of the ocean. They have spa in the hotel itself and the restaurant was amazing.
title: Beach facing hotel - Very clean and classy room

text: I absolutely love this hotel. Well the Decour in the rooms is a bit dated, the beds are extremely comfortable, the shower is awesome including a rain shower, the view was lovely, rooftop pool refreshing with amazing views, same can be said for the free breakfast and lounge on the rooftop. This is a great value for well located hotel.
title: Great hotel-everything you would

text:
I am currently staying here , and I have enjoyed almost everything. The staff are all amazing , so kind and helpful. 
My room is beautiful with the most comfortable  bed I have had in Bali. The housekeeping boys do such a great job. 
The room and bathroom are big , the room has multiple  power points for charging the gadgets , and the lighting has so many choices, it is excellent . I  am  on the ground floor and have a beautiful garden outlook.
The bathroom has a walk in shower , with a non slip floor in the shower.  The bathroom door has a full length mirror on both sides of the door.  The shower has a hand held option and a wonderful rain shower with fantastic pressure and lots of hot water.
The air con works perfectly and my room always smell clean and fresh .
Breakfast is included and I  was happy with the choices . I also had room service, prices wre quite reasonable for a hotel.
I used the hotel Spa for a manicure and pedicure and I loved the pampering, one of best so far.

My only cons are that even though the spotless, super shiny tiles are beautiful,  they can be very slippery. 

My other problem was that there are no easy steps into the pool. It looked so inviting, but with my bionic knees , no matter which way I tried , I  couldn't  get in. I  know I could have jumped in , but I  wouldn't  have been able to get out. I thought it very strange that they have a wheel chair lift to get up too the pool area, but no way for a disabled person to enter and exit the pool itself. 

I am happy to report that I  have slept so well every night , with no noises to disturb me .
I  would love to stay here again, 
Thank you so much Sulis Beach Hotel .
title: A Lovely Hotel

text:
We had an amazing service from all the staffs. Definitely recommend the Day Spa, I used the Day Spa every day when we returned from our trips.
Our room and bathroom was cleaned and everything worked eg. toilet flushed, good water pressure, fridge kept the beers cool etc.
Roof top pool area and pool clean and amazing sunsets.
title: Great Location and Service

text:
Had an amazing stay here.
Really friendly and helpful staff throughout the hotel.
The girls on the front desk were awesome, so professional and efficient.
Pretty much everything throughout is of a high standard.
Spotless rooms with many great details, excellent air con, lovely bathroom, beds and linen of the highest quality.
I especially liked the lighting in the room, so many variations to suit any mood.
Lovely pool area on the roof.
Great breakfast.
Just a really nice hotel.
Will definitely visit again.
Thank you to all the staff for all your help.
title: Love this place

text:
Stayed for a couple of days as a “fill in” before going to another hotel.
Pristine rooms, big tv, good shower, many power points, good size balcony.
Excellent value for the price.
Also has a great restaurant and a fantastic spa area.
Highly recommended.
title: Great value for money

text:
A peaceful place in the mid of the party town i would say. Couples perfect retreat at a valuable price to pay! Best facilities and cool staff around to assist whenever you need any. As it is located perfectly to anywhere you need to go around the Kuta town! Rooftop pool with skyline overlooking the sea and Mount Agung!  A place that you should never miss i guess! 
#ItsReal
title: Perfect location and peaceful stay

text:
You’ll be forgiven for not recognising the Sulis Beach Hotel in Tuban in previous life it was the Green Garden Resort and Spa.

You can expect the same friendly service, excellent food and relaxing spa treatments.  The rooftop pool is amazing and the added shade sails a welcome relief from the Bali heat.
Rooms are bigger than most as is the bar fridge, plenty of room for those Bintangs!  

The Sulis Beach hotel is new, bright, clean and spacious and well worth a visit.
title: Oasis in Tuban

text:
We stayed for 9 nights. Check in was smooth we got in after midnight. Room was lovely & spacious with Balcony. Shower is good has 2 shower heads,big & small one. Pool Towels supplied in room. Big enough fridge. Beds are comfy too. Spa is good also had 2 treatments there. Breakfast is average,food supply was very minimal in the warmers which was quite strange seeing all the people that came up for breakfast walking around with empty plates not very good at all. All Staff are excellent. Thank you for having us we had a great stay & enjoyed every moment. 
Love Linda & Angela Room 2104 xxx
title: Good hotel

text:
I stayed here with my boyfriend in Jun 2017. The hotel was newly opened so everything was clean and in tip top condition. We were particularly impressed by the big swimming pool with good views and the fried rice served for breakfast. I suggest that you skip the western option entirely since that tasted average at best. The fried rice however, was the best I’ve tasted in my entire life. I tried many other restaurants in Bali but none were close enough. We also enjoyed the clean spacious room with cable tv and fast wifi.

The only thing that was disappointing was the massage we tried. The price was significantly more expensive than the others on the streets and yet the massage was below our expectations as the masseurs did not apply enough pressure despite our requests. Basically, the massage was overpriced and did not feel good.

Overall, we strongly recommend this hotel because of its spaciousness, cleanliness, big pool, delicious fried rice, cable tv and fast wifi. But please skip the massage. We’ll definitely stay here again if we ever return to Bali.
title: Best fried rice and swimming pool

text: This is a very modern hotel about 150 Metres from the beach & it's quiet & friendly, You can see the planes coming in over the ocean but you cant hear them, the rooftop pool is great and the food is also really good, the staff are fantastic.
title: This is a very modern hotel about 150 Metres from the beach & it's quiet & friendly

text:
We got the hint about this spa from their brochure at the airport. 
The Deluxe Couples package is worth every penny!
Also, the food was great.
The weather was not on our side to enjoy the pool, but the overall impression this place gives us a very good one.
title: Excellent spa

text:
Everything was fantastic, from the quality of the room, to the large fridge, pool area, breakfast buffet - best I've  had in SE asia. Stayed during the volcano activity and this hotel went out of their way to assist with airport transfers a number of times.
Highly recommend the spa treatment and everything about this place, would definitely stay again.
title: Amazing - couldnt ask for more!

text:
We stayed this hotel for 3 nights. Hotel was very clean and the room was very nice. 
Specially thanks To Wulan Who helped us To get a driver! Even we werent there anymore.
The pool was great and also we ordered some food there, not bad at all! I enjoyed vanilla milkshake very much. 
Breakfast was ok, you can order pancakes Or different kinds of eggs straight from the kitchen. Very helpful and friendly stuff. Good location To everywhere.
title: Clean and friendly

text:
Loved this place,, close to everything by walking distance! Best thing is that its in kuta's main area but away from all the crowd and loud clubs, so u can still relax and reach those areas easily anytime! 

Hotel is super clean!! 
Breakfast was great, but would prefer more international sections to serve all different tastes! 

 The only negative point i faced that they dont have toiletries as tooth brush soap etc... only liquid soap (not good for face) and liquid shampoo! 

1 minute close to the beach, though kuta's beach is not that good ! 

Loved my bedroom view! & their Spa massage is a must try👍🏼 Not expensive and very good!
title: Amazing place!!!

text: We stayed 10 nights and enjoyed the spacious bedroom and large comfy bed and fantastic well lit bathroom and shower.  All the staff  especially- Meda, Bagus, Ary, Wisnu, Ray, Dekdi, Dian and Bakti were very friendly and helpful.  The hotel was very clean in all areas and we enjoyed a fantastic view from the restaurant and pool and bar areas on the 4th and 5th floors. The wifi was weak and each time we needed to use it we had to sign in.  The food menu was the same each day and more variety would be nice especially for a long stay in the hotel.
title: Amazing value hotel for spacious comfortable bedroom

text:
Spent 3 nights at the Sulis Beach its a nice new hotel situated in south Kuta we were given a room at the back of the hotel overlooking the adjoining hotel as i had requested via email prior to arrival having looked on google maps prior to booking as it is situated on a bend in the road and i did not want to be disturbed by road noise.
There is no need to worry about this as the road is not busy at all so a room overlooking the road would be fine, The rooms are big and spacious and spotlessly clean with large balcony with table and chairs,Nice bathroom with large walk in shower   complimentary toiletries, Breakfast was served on the fourth floor and was plentiful, the pool is on the roof surrounded by a sun terrace covered in faux grass which gets very hot in the sun, Sun loungers are situated on three sides of the pool with one side under cover the only problem i could find with whole hotel was the sunbeds there are made of woven plastic and although not solid there was not a lot of give perhaps an investment in pads would be good all in all a good hotel at an excellent price.
title: BARGAIN

text:
Where do I start?
So I check in early and tell reception I will be checking out early........back to that later!
I enjoyed a quick pedi and 1hr massage in the awesome Sulis spa, dinner consisting of pork ribs & satay sticks on the 4th floor and then a swim on the 5th floor rooftop pool over looking the beach and Kuta surrounds and the whole time the service was absolutely outstanding!
The rooms are roomy, ultra clean, modern and the bed, O my the bed is cloudy comfort!
So getting back to my check in, I just jumped into bed & I get a knock at the door and reception has arranged a couple of breakfast boxes of croissants, butter jam, boiled eggs, & a fresh orange juice all because she knew I was going to miss breakfast! 
That is outstanding service and that’s where this hotel will excel! 
I will most definitely 100% be back here again soon!
Thank you Sulis Team and I want one of those Super aprons (love them)! 
Happy Travels!
title: Are you freaking kidding me?

text: We stayed at Sulis beach hotel for 4 days it was like heaven compared to the previous hotel the beds and pillows are soft staff are fantastic, we enjoyed sunset dinners on the roof top restaurant and the pool had shaded lounges they also have a small playground for the kids. buffet breakfast was always yummy and the drinks and restaurant menu was very well priced. it has a in house massage parlour and free airport transfers. it is located in a quiet area not a single rooster to be heard. it is situated 2 mins from a quiet beach we will definitely be back to stay again.
title: Amazing

text:
After visiting the Green Garden Beach Resort for a number of years, I have been watching in anticipation as the new hotel emerged to replace the small resort hotel that had been a great R&R for us.

There was great surprise & pleasure that at last we entered the new Sulis.  What a great facility & staffing that is now located on the GGs previous site. Especially the spa facilities & staff were to die for.  Great work for just a few dollars, so friendly & caring.  The room was so modern & well appointed, the breakfast was more than adequate and with a great elevated ocean view, the roof top pool & entertainment areas were also terrific.  

Great work to those with the insite to create such a lovely resort without feeling crowded or forgotten
title: Rising from the "ashes"

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for revisit after a few years back when we were Green Garden Beach Resort. Your positive & comforting feedback has made our days even brighter.

Please keep in touch & take care.

Yours,

Paul & family
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My experience at Sulis Beach Hotel was different to anyone else.  I had an accident on my 2nd day they were so good to me.  The Manager took me to the hospital stayed with me all day and then took me back the next day. 
The hotel is gorgeous so clean and the breakfast was delicious.
The Spa at the hotel is the best natural spa in Bali.  The massages and the ladies working in the Spa are beautiful kind souls.
It has a beautiful pool on the roof over looking the beach's as far as the eye can see north and south.
I would recommend this hotel to all my friends and family a truly beautiful hotel and spa.
title: Michelle Richards

owner_response.text:
Hi Michelle. 

We're truly sorry to learn about your accident; it must have held you back from doing many great activities you had planned for a long time. Despite the accident, your positive gesture & feedback made our days even brighter.

Please take care and we look forward having you again on your next Bali holiday.

Yours,

Paul & family
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This is a most confusing property. The location is great. The rooms are 5 star with 4 star bathrooms. The beds are ridiculously comfortable and the room is large. They are maybe even better than the HI resort across the road. However, you can tell the owners have experience with rowdy people (they own the Febris too) because you are treated like a teenager on spring break. They eliminated any decor that could be damaged or stolen, making the place feel soulless. 

The restaurant is breakfast only and it's a bit Fawlty Towers. You can have lunch or dinner there but don't. It's horrible. There is no service by the pool and no shade, but I believe they are working on that. I was blown away by the pool. Literally. There is also no shelter from the wind. There was nobody there most of the time. 

Also the thing about the mossies is true. They cannot control the neighbours though. It's not bad if you keep the doors closed all the time. 

To the owner I would say: treat this as a bit more upmarket. Raise the price and invest in the F&B and pool. You can't beat price and location but it feels too impersonal this way. Also, you are throwing away money. You have so many square meters that are not generating revenue. Get a real hotel manager to run the place. She who is running it now needs help. 

Special mention: the Spa is excellent and if you're staying in the neighbourhood, use this one. Not expensive for a full service spa and better than most hotel spas.
title: Good but should be great

owner_response.text:
Dear "Henkybaby"

Thanks for your recent stay. You are right that the restaurant needs better coordination service as team works are not at their best yet. The teams have actually been progressing pretty well if we compare their performance 2 months ago while most of them are still very young. The restaurant is still on opening promotion and hence the price offered is very affordable in view of the food quality & size being served. The restaurant on Level 4 is mainly for breakfast and lunch. Dinner is on Level 5 (top floor) with beautiful ocean view; it is very popular now with patrons mostly from the surrounding hotels for sunset.

ROOFTOP POOL
Sun shade along the pool has recently been completed, covering a long side of the swimming pool. Hence, patrons can now choose pool loungers with or without shade. Seemingly, you missed the green totems along both sides of the pool (located behind sun loungers, in front of glass fence); they are for service order. We might need to make the service signs larger and more noticeable as there are 8 of them around the pool. Each comes with a little buzzer to call waiter for service.

Despite the above, I am glad to learn that you enjoyed your stay and loved our hotel rooms and spa services. In future, feel free to call one of the managers on duty should you need assistance or information to make your stay more comfortable. Thanks again for taking time to write a feedback.

With best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed at the new Sulis Beach Hotel for two weeks and loved everything about it, the staff are fantastic and we must give them credit for there help with our three year old grandson, they all played with him and kept him happy. The rooms are lovely and clean and the breakfast is fresh and tasty with a large variety each day. Our holiday was made extra special with the fantastic service we recieved from everyone at the hotel.
title: Great Location and Awesome staff

text:
Relatively new hotel, near the beach, opposite the Holiday Inn. Rooms are generous size and well equipped: large bed, couch, desk, chair, fridge and balcony with seating.
Rooftop pool has NO SHADE TREES OR UMBRELLAS WHATSOEVER. A very uninviting area in the hot daytime sun.
The in-house spa has good package deals but individual services are quite pricey for this class hotel.
Bathrooms are a good size: shower only in our room. Not sure if other rooms may have a bath. Great shower though, with plenty of hot water. However, there is already a build up of dirt and mould in the shower area. This is so typical of many Bali hotels: they just have no concept of keeping bathrooms clean.
Also our room seemed to be popular with tiny ants. Had to buy a can of fly spray to get rid of them.
Overall, this is a good hotel for a reasonable price.
title: Good price.

owner_response.text:
Dear "maryannupright"

Many thanks for bringing up a few issues you found during your hotel stay. I tried to contact you for your booking details 3 days ago through Tripadvisor message facility but received no response yet. As soon as I saw your photo of the bathroom tiles, room checks were made but tile grouts with dirt & mould were not found. So, please help me to locate your room so immediate action can be made (it would only take minutes to remove them). Neither Mary Anne nor Upright were found in any of our room bookings in August.

SHADE ALONG POOL
Shade along pool should be completed by beginning of September (i.e. within a couple of weeks time). I wonder if you saw the supporting poles along the pool during your stay as the project has started since last week.

Nevertheless, despite the above, I'm glad to learn that you liked the room facilities & the generous size in view of the very reasonable price for August. Hopefully I will hear from you again shortly with the booking details. Thanks.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed here solo for 6 nights in August...had a very nice time. Its a relatively new hotel and the rooms, pool, restaurant, etc. are kept immaculately clean. It is very close to the beach, and once you're there you can walk north for about 20 min to get to Kuta beach.  The staff is very accommodating and friendly. Breakfast was quite good and had a large variety of exotic fruit...be sure to try the snake fruit and ask for a Balinese coffee!
title: Great value and location!

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your recent stay and taking time to write a feedback.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stayed here for one night last monday. Their staffs are friendly, they gave us warm welcome with two glasses of fruit.
The room is very nice and clean with bright lighting. And I love their simple balcony (our room is in the first floor), there is like a garden sensation in the balcony with artificial grass on the floor.
Their is no complain with the breakfast. The food is good at all.
The rooftop swimming pool is good too. Clean and nice design.
The hotel isn't direct to beach but you can just walk to the beach in front of this hotel.
Very recommended.
title: Everything is Nice!

owner_response.text:
We're glad that you enjoyed your stay. Your lovely feedback was much appreciated.

Hopefully you will come back again soon with longer stay. Cheers.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed here for 4 nights and throughly enjoyed ourselves. The rooms were super clean and spacious. The staff were all very friendly and accommodating. We tried out the spa here three times as we found the services professional and rates rather reasonable as compared to other spa of equivalent standard. The breakfast was adequate but decent. We ordered room service on a couple of occasions as we wanted to drink from the wine we bought from the airport and found the room service quite good and food quite tasty. The hotel is also located within walking distance to the shopping centres and Kuta beach. 

Would recommend this hotel to visitors to Bali who are looking for a hotel with great service at reasonable price 👍
title: 5 stars experience!

owner_response.text:
Thanks so much for staying with us. We are glad that all boxes were ticked and everything we did met your approval. 

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The hotel was very nice and neat and the room was clean. The personel was very friendly as well.

There was just one negative experience we had. We were missing a swim short when we left and no action was taken after notifying the manager...
title: Nice rooms

owner_response.text:
Dear "leonievannoorden"

Thanks for your recent stay and taking time to write a review. I responded with a personal message through Tripadvisor a few days ago but received no reply from you yet. Let me respond with details logged by our Operations Manager as follows.

You have reported just before check-out that a pair of your husband's swim shorts were missing (2 days earlier after being used) and last being seen were in the room. After my Operations Manager made the coordination & search, he explained to you that they were not found by our housekeeping team. His search covered Lost & Found record, laundry record, your room attendant (including his personal locker).

Despite your fabulous feedback on the hotel's cleanliness and staff friendliness, apparently the missing shorts have tarnished your rating on the hotel. Is there anything else you would like me to follow-up with the Operations Manager and his housekeeping team? Please email me in person. Thanks.

Sincerely,

PAULUS / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This is the former Green Garden Beach Resort. Ony opened middle of May but OMG its still the same spa menu, spa prices and spa staff! Owned, operted and trained same as Febris. I had ALL the treatments over the week and hard to pick favourite. For 230,000 rp I had hour massage then and hour facial. Or try the scalp sensation for 210000, where they wash your hair, spend 30 minute massaging conditioner into your scalp, then 30 minutes massaging neck, shoulders, arms and feet before washing it off and drying your hair. On my last day instaed of paying for late check out, I paid 500000, and spent 4 hours being massaged, washed, body masked, bubble bath, facial, pedicured and scalp sensation. Best ever!!
title: BEST SPA IN BALI

owner_response.text:
Hi Tracey,

Being on soft opening, your words of encouragement and lovely feedback meant a lot for us all here. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again in near future.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Kuta var inte vårt favoritställe på Bali. Men Sulis Beach Hotel & SPA var vi mycket nöjda med. Rent och snyggt, trevlig personal, jättestort rum och nära stranden. Promenadavstånd till flygplatsen. Så smidigt! Dessutom var det inga problem att stanna kvar på hotellet efter utcheckning och utnyttja takpoolen.
title: Sista natten på Bali

text: Хороший отель, чистый. На постельном есть небольшие пятна, полотенца тоже не новые, но все при этом чисто. Завтраки хорошие, разнообразные. Фрукты на завтрак каждый день разные. Звукоизоляция в номерах хорошая. Уборка в номерах ежедневная, ежедневная замена плательного белья. Персонал отзывчивый, сами предлагают чартер до аэропорта, предлагают комнату хранения багажа, даже если вы уже выехали днём, а самолёт у вас вечером.
title: Хороший отель, чистый.

text:
拙いこちらの英語を理解してくださり、とても過ごしやすかったです。
受付の方だけでなく、スタッフの皆さんが笑顔でとても良い時間を過ごすことができました。
立地面でも近くに、クラクラバス乗り場がありますし、たくさんタクシーが走っています。
両替所やランドリーもあり、困りませんでした。
このお値段で、このサービスならぜひまた泊まりたいです。
客層としては、日本人は私たちだけ、他は欧米からの方が多いイメージでした。
title: 素晴らしい滞在となりました。

text:
Не самый Новый и свежий, но довольно чистенький отель на Куте. Рядом хороший пляж и ехать от аэропорта минут 8. В общем самое то, чтобы начать знакомство с Бали и чуть выдохнуть после долгого перелета.

В отеле есть сносный ресторан, где по демократичным ценам готовят Локал кухню. Эти же ребята готовят и завтраки, они на 3+. А вот бассейн на крыше прям идеален.
title: самое то, чтобы начать знакомство с Бали и чуть выдохнуть после долгого перелета.

text: В принципе, заголовком отзыва уже все и сказано. Плюс еще наличие балкона, что для курильщиков весьма важно. В 5-ти минутах ходьбы находится достаточно крупный торговый центр. В Ресторан ходили несколько раз и ни разу не были разочарованы. Метрах в 100 есть городской пляж, но он скорее не для купания, а чтобы любоваться закатом.
title: Просторные номера и хороший ресторан

text: 房間大，電視很新。有陽台可以曬衣服。沙灘就只有20m遠。頂樓是泳池，可看海景與飛機起降。附近吃，按摩及24Hr便利店都有。早餐是Buffet不錯吃。CP高。
title: 員工親切，距機場及海灘超近。

text: 離機場近，離市區也近，離海邊也近，但海邊沒什麼風景。住宿價格十分划算，飯店乾淨，早餐簡單但美味，泳池也乾淨。如果你在峇里島排滿了行程，可以考慮此飯店，不會讓你踩雷。
title: CP值超高

text:
Hôtel réservé pour 2 nuits suite à notre arrivée à l'aéroport.
Situé à 10 min en taxi de celui-ci parfait quand on arrive un peu tard dans la journée.
Très bien situé proche de la plage, déserte d'ailleurs.
Proche de la ville, on a tout à proximité, le change, les salons de massages, les taxis, les restaurants et le centre commercial.
Le petit déjeuner est bon.
Les chambres sont propres et très belles.
Piscine également très belle et agréable.
L'environnement de l'hôtel est plutôt calme, on entend pas de bruit.
Nus recommandons vivement.
title: HÔTEL TRES BIEN

text:
Wij verbleven hier 7 nachten. Dit hotel ligt uit het drukke Kuta. Kuta beach is zeker te voet te doen! Alles is eigenlijk op wandelafstand. Rondom het hotel kan je lekker en goedkoop eten (zeker op TripAdvisor kijken voor eetplekjes). In het hotel kan je ook zeer lekker eten op de rooftop (prijs valt zeer goed mee).
Bij aankomst kregen we een vers drankje en een massage van 5min aan de schouders, dit was zalig!! Hebben dan meteen een massage geboekt in het hotel. Iets prijziger dan op straat maar wel de beste massage die ik al had gehad.
Het ontbijt was niet super uitgebreid, wel had je keuze tussen Indonesische gerechten en gewoon Amerikaans ontbijt. Je kon ook wafels/pannenkoeken krijgen. Na een klacht te hebben gemeld over onze luidruchtige buren, werd hier onmiddellijk een oplossing voor geboden en kregen we een andere kamer.
title: Goede prijs-kwaliteitverhouding

text: Hotel ligt op max 2 km van het vliegveld maar absoluut geen vliegtuig lawaai. Gunstige prijs, grote kamers, mooi super groot zwembad. Goed service incl welkomst massage van 5 min. Massage afd is zeer goed, wel tijdig reserveren. Het restaurant is uitstekend, je hoeft niet naar buiten om te gaan eten. Ontbijt is ok. Wifi is niet zo sterk af en toe. DE TV heeft zelfs een NED tv zender. Voor de terugreis naar het vliegveld is gratis airport transfer vh hotel beschikbaar. De beach is op 200 m en erg druk.
title: Uitstekend hotel, grote kamers, goede service

text:
Avant de repartir en France nous avons passé notre dernière nuit dans cet hôtel et c'est tout simplement le meilleur hôtel que nous avons fait en Indonésie durant notre séjour.
Le personnel est agréable, à l'écoute et très professionnel. Tout est propre et bien pensé.
Le petit déjeuner buffet est parfait. La piscine en rooftop est très agréable.
Concernant la chambre tout est parfait, le confort du lit et les nombreux équipements. Rien n'est laissé au hasard.
Il propose également un chauffeur pour vous emmener à l'aéroport qui se trouve à moins de 10mn en voiture gratuitement.
Nous avons également testé le spa avec un massage balinais qui est à la hauteur de la qualité de cet établissement.
Bref un très bon séjour.
title: Très bon séjour

text:
Hôtel très bien situé à côté de l’aéroport, pratique pour aller au sud de Bali ( Nusa dua etc ) accueil au top et chambre très propre et confortable.

La piscine sur le toit magnifique avec une très belle vue sur Kuta et la plage
title: Très bon hôtel

text:
공항과 근접하여 편리했습니다 
시설은 깨끗했고 쾌적했습니다 
단점은 방음이 너무 안되서 새벽에 잠이 깼고, 방음만 잘 된다면 상당히 좋을 것 같습니다
title: 공항과 가까워서 편리했던 호텔

text: Fomos 6 amigos e gostamos bastante do hotel. Quartos muito grande e com varanda. À piscina do hotel fica no último piso e tem uma vista para o mar muito agradável. O restaurante é muito bom e barato. O pequeno almoço é buffet.
title: Excelente hotel

text: su segnalazione di amici abbiamo prenotato con largo anticipo il nostro soggiorno di ben 8 giorni . siamo arrivati verso le 20 e ci è stata data una camera al piano terra , un pò rumorosa poiche su affaccia sulla strada anche se questa non è molto trafficata . il vantaggio è che in 20 minuti si è nel centro di kuta e si è fuori dl casino , 5 minuti ,cinque minuti veri la mattina presto dall'aeroporto .si potrebbe fare forse anche a piedi .segnalo che in tutta bali c'è un traffico allucinante che è un vero problema per gli spostamenti . da kuta al potato club (circa 10 km )  non meno di un ora e mezza in taxi.camere molto pulite moderne ottima la spa interna e ottima piscina all'ultimo piano.
title: un buon albergo molto pulito

owner_response.text:
Dear Max

Thanks for your recent stay at Sulis and taking time to write honest feedback with positives and negative.

I'm glad to learn that you loved the hotel's location, the hotel room, spa and our rooftop pool.

Traffic around the hotel is seldom congested (in fact traffic at this side of town is well known for being quiet). However, traffic becomes a real problem from the center of Kuta, Legian, to Seminyak and beyond (especially Jalan Raya Kerobokan and Jalan Kayu Aya where Potato Head is located).

We hope to have the privilege to host you again on your next Bali holiday. Please free to reach out to me should you need any assistance with your future visit(s). Thanks.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Lieu agréable à 200 mètres de la mer et assez proche des commerces et restaurants. L’hôtel propose un transport gratuit pour l’aéroport. La chambre est grande, très propre et confortable. Large choix pour le petit déjeuner. Une belle piscine sur le niveau supérieur. Le personnel est souriant et agréable. Possibilité de prendre une douche en fin d’après-midi avant de reprendre l’avion.
title: Hôtel agréable

text: Hotel carino e nel centro di Kuta, il costo è buono per la qualità dei servizi e la gentilezza dello staff. Consiglio vivamente i massaggi che la spa offre perché fantastici. Le stanze pulite e luminose di recente ristrutturazione. Discreta la cucina motivo per cui non raggiunge le 5 stelle.
title: Ottimo

text: 前回は2/22-3/1,2019に宿泊し、気に入ったので今回も5/24から７泊しました。今回はバリのローカルをメインとする旅なので、手に入りにくい物を購入して持って行く為の買い物中心の宿泊でした。朝の海岸散歩の後朝食を４階の眺めの良い所でとり、午前中はプール、午后から買い物というスケジュールにしました。プールには日傘が１２本デッキチェアは３０台以上有り、好きな所を選べる状態です。朝食のメニューもそこそこ有り、この条件でこの値段のホテルは他には無いので、今後も此処を使用します。因に空港への無料の車が予約すれば早朝から利用可能です。
title: 二度目の宿泊です

text: Ich kann das Hotel nur empfehlen. Es liegt in der nähe des Flughafens aber kein Lärm von dort. Das Personal ist immer freundlich und die Auswahl beim Frühstücksbuffet ist auch gut. Es gibt auch einen Wasserspender um seine Trinkflaschen aufzufüllen
title: Super Hotel zu kleinem Preis

text:
Super Hotel. Empfang mit frischem Obst und kühlem Tuch.
Zimmer sauber und die Ausstattung ist top. Safe, Kosmetikspiegel, Badeschlappen, Strandtücher,Seife,Duschgel,Shampoo.
Frühstück ist reichhaltig und jeder sollte hier fündig werden.
Wir kommen wieder. Transfer zum Flughafen inkl. Fahrtzeit bei uns 6Min.
title: Perfekt als Stopover

text:
Un très bonne hotel qui ne coûte pas grand chose. La terasse est très appréciable avec la piscine. Vous pouvez y manger, y boire ou vous reposer. 
Cest calme, a deux pas de la mer. 

Le restaurant de l'hôtel est bon, pas cher mais sans plus. 

Buffet de petit-déjeuner variée et correct. 

Bonne chambre avec frigo et tour ce quil faut ! 

A recommander.
title: Bonne hotel pas cher, belle vue sur le toit et bonne emplacement

text:
昔Green Garden Hotelが有った場所に出来た五階建てのホテルです。屋上にプールがあり、パラソルが両側に１２、デッキチェアが２４＋あり、７泊している間に一番混んでいた時でも１０人しか利用客はおらず、ゆったり利用出来ました。客室はメインがDXルームでHoliday Inn向きと、Rama Beach向きに通路を挟んで各階20室程有ります。今回は３２１１号室でRamaを見下ろす部屋を利用しました。部屋は比較的広く、ベッドも大きなもので、ベランダにはテーブルと椅子、選択物干が有り便利でした。
収納は大きいのですが、引き出し型のものは一切無く、全て見える収納になります。
朝食会場は４階で木の上越しに海が眺められ気持ちの良い場所でした。クロワッサンが特に美味しく感じましたが、朝食全般では毎日略同じで、変化が有ればと感じました。
但し二人で朝食付き、毎日タオル、プールタオル、リネン類が交換され、かつ空港への送り付きで5,000円以下なので大変気に入りました。建物も新しいので何処も奇麗です余りバリらしくは有りませんが。場所も海岸に近い良い場所でした、
title: 五階からの眺めは開放的で最高

text: 一次不错的入住体验!细心的体贴的酒店服务给我们留下深刻的印象!入住接待的人员以微笑的笑容和欢迎的水果迎接我们。知道我们第2天一早要赶飞机，酒店就提前一晚把早餐打包好送到我们的房间，还配有水果。地理位置也不错，走一段路程就是库塔洋人街商业区，旺中带静，吃和买都非常方便。
title: A considerate stay experience

text: 新しく綺麗な部屋で、その上に広く価格に比べコスパ最高です。また、繁華街からは離れていますので、静かさを求めるかたにお勧めです。強いて言えば、朝食が種類も少なく味もイマイチなところがマイナスです。
title: 綺麗な部屋

text:
雖然這家酒店不算豪華，但房間相當整潔，頂樓有個大泳池，可以欣賞美麗的日落。
早餐尚算豐富，味道不錯，而且有免費的機場接送，超讚！
以這個價錢入住，CP價超高，基本上沒有可挑剔的地方！
title: CP價超高的一家飯店！

text:
O Sulis Beach Hotel está muito bem localizado; perto de carro do aeroporto, perto a pé da praia, de vários restaurantes e shoppings. Fica na parte sul da praia de Kuta numa zona sossegada, algo afastado da confusão do centro. Os quartos são muito grandes e muito limpos. As massagens no SPA são fenomenais. A piscina no terraço é grande e tranquila. O pequeno almoço é muito diversificado e com muitas frutas tropicais exóticas.
Nas zonas comuns pode-se ouvir sempre as musicas ZEN de Bali. Muito relaxante.
O wifi é bom e os funcionários simpáticos.
Ficaria novamente hospedado neste hotel. Recomendo!
title: Hotel em frente à praia em zona tranquila.

photos.caption: Quarto muito grande e muito limpo.
Frutas tropicais exóticas e saborosas. Ainda faltam aqui mais.

text:
這裡的環境很乾淨，雖然沒有豪華的設備，但這裡有美麗的泳池，也有美麗的景色，交通也算方便。這裡的餐廳食物也很好，服務人員也很友善。

特别推介這裡的spa and massage.地方乾淨，美麗，服務員十分專業，力度足夠，價錢也很便宜。完事後更有沖身的地方，十分喜歡！
title: 簡單，便宜，舒服的酒店

text: Stanza bellissima, arredata con gusto, grande e davvero pulita! Personale professionale e gentile, cibo e cocktail top, piscina sul rooftop molto bella, con vista e solarium attrezzato, servizio bibite e cibo a bordo piscina, spa, posizione ottima, vicino a negozi, ristoranti e praticamente a 2 passi dalla spiaggia...davvero ottimo 💯
title: Favoloso😍

text:
Très bien situé pour une dernière nuit avant de reprendre l’avion. Service de navette retour aéroport compris. 
Personnel très pro. 
Un hôtel au chic un peu démodé, mais plaisant. Chambre très confortable. Petit dej buffet, au dessus de la moyenne. Piscine sur le toit vu sur la mer, avec gazon artificiel. 
Une bonne adresse.
title: Un bon choix

text: أراد زوجي لتصفح في بالي ، حيث اختار أحد فنادق التي لم يكن من الضروري الذهاب بعيداً إلى أماكن التزلج. ومع ذلك ، أصررت على عدم العيش مباشرة في كوتا ، حيث صاخبة للغاية ومزدحمة. أصبح "سولس" حلاً وسطًا وناجحًا. كانت الغرفة ممتازة ، في كل مرة كنا سعداء عندما عدنا إليها. اعجبني الإفطار كثيرا. كان الشاطئ قريبًا جدًا ، وكنت هناك مستريحًا بشكل رائع ، بينما كان زوجي يتدحرج على الأمواج على لوحه.
title: مثالي للأزواج

text:
Die Lage ist sehr gut, 100m zum Strand und ca. 10Minuten zum Airport.
Das Hotel hat eine sehr gute Ausstattung und ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet.
Das Badezimmer war absolut top. Das Personal ist auch sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Von der Buchung bis zum kostenfreien Airport Shuttle war wirklich Alles ok
Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen.
title: Sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt

text: Hotel is zeer schoon en ligt erg strategisch. Vlak bij het strand, in de rust en op minder dan 20 min loop je naar het drukke deel van Denpasar. Misschien iets duurder maar een beter alternatief tegen vergelijkbare kosten is er nauwelijks.
title: Zeer aan te bevelen

text: Echt super schone en ruime kamers. Schitterend ruim en schoon zwembad op dak, dus geweldig uitzicht over Kuta en de zee! Top ontbijt met veel keus en geweldig personeel bij de ommelet en wafel balie! Kwalitatief hoogwaardige massage, echt een aanrader! Ik kan Sulis aan iedereen aanraden en kan niks negatiefs noemen. TOPPER!!!
title: Super schoon en zeer ruim!

text:
Situación normal no es primera línea es segunda está cerca de la playa
No es mala situación cerca del aeropuerto  servicio gratuito de traslado que funciona muy bien 
Está cerca de la movida pero fuera del barullo a 10 minutos andando 
La habitación muy bien grande buen baño muy nueva y bien decorada la wifi regular 
Con balcón de verdad una piscina fabulosa 
El desayuno regular poca cosa y muy de batallona,  podías pedir cosas a cocina pero con cola y poca reposición cuando fuimos el último día no pudimos desayunar porque empieza a las 7
title: Muy buen hotel

text:
superbe hôtel , personnel très agréable toujours la pour vous ;
Petit déjeuné très varié et très bon 
Très bien placé , a 200 m de la plage et a proximité du centre ville des bars , supermarché et de park aquatique waterbum .
très bon restaurant et rue rempli de salon de massage pour un prix dérisoire
Ne pas hésiter!!
title: hotel magnifique et personnel adorable

text:
das hotel liegt in der naehe vom airport.hat grosse zimmer mit modernen einrichtungen. einen grossen pool mit vielen liegen und grossen sonnenschutz.
der halbe dachplatz und die umrandung des pools sind mit kunstrasen belegt.
und es gibt dort auch einen schoenen blick aufs meer. genau so ,wie die fruehstuecketage. leider passt sich das niveau des fruehstueck nicht dem niveau des hotels an. es gibt ein reichhaltiges TV programm mit DW mit einem grossen bildschirm.
ein balkon isi vorhanden und ein grosses spa angebot. das personal ist freundlich.
title: empfehlenswert

text: Os quartos são simples mas bastante espaçosos, ainda que não tenham espaço para guardar roupa, se a sua estadia for prolongada, como foi o meu caso, 18 noites. A localização é excelente a metros de algumas pequenas praias, menos cheias que a praia de kuta e MUITO mais limpas. Os pequenos almoços são variados e generosos. A piscina no último piso é agradável e proporciona uma excelente vista. O restaurante fornece alternativas agradáveis. A não perder, a massagem de corpo inteiro.
title: Descanso com vista de mar

text:
Hotel calme, propre mais aucune chambre avec vraie vue mer, mensonges ! Le personnel très lent c'est dommage , et attention à la fumée du " desmoutiquage ". 
Good hotel, calm but no room vith ocean view, only in the pool. Staff à little bit lazy
title: Simple good view from the pool

owner_response.text:
Dear "littletraveller75" 

Thanks for your stay with your friends recently and taking time to write a feedback. 

The ocean is visible from every room's balcony (except the ground-floor rooms) but we never advertise our Deluxe room with sea/beach view at all (please let me know should you find otherwise). Upper-floor rooms located closer to the beach have larger view of the ocean (from their balconies) than rooms located further from the beach. 

Please feel free to share more details about the staff being slow or "a little bit lazy" directly to my email below so I can bring it up to the concerned department(s) for rectification. I have sent you numerous messages since mid last month through Tripadvisor messaging facility but you did not respond at all.

Best regards, 

PAUL / General Manager 
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Hotel con instalaciones muy nuevas o bien conservadas. Piscina en el piso superior con impresionantes vistas. Sirven comida en cualquier estancia del hotel a muy buen precio (un plato de pasta menos de 3€). Las habiataciones amplias y limpias, el baño moderno y limpio. Tiene un pequeño balcón con mesa y 2 sillas y tendedero. Nevera, tetera y secador de pelo. La atención del personal es excelente y te llevan gratis al aeropuerto
title: Recomendable

text:
Un super hôtel, tranquille avec des services abordables!  Beaucoup de restaurant autour et à distance de marche d’un centre commerciale. Restaurant et spa très bien et vraiment pas trop cher !
J’y retournerais avec joie ! Les déjeuners manque un peu de variété... mais ils sont excellent !
title: Wow !!

text: Relación calidad-precio un 10, la habitación grande y limpia , el desayuno variado y rico, la piscina en la última planta y buen tamaño y personal atento y siempre dispuestos a ayudarte . Alquilé una moto en el hotel pero si te quieres ahorrar unas rupias a pocos metros tienes sitios donde hacerlo. Traslado a el aeropuerto gratuito.
title: Bueno

text:
Wir waren in Summe zwei Nächte in diesem Hotel der Aufenthalt war wirklich schön und das Hotel ist absolut weiter zu empfehlen.

Das Hotel ist neu und sauber und ich denke das ist das ausschlaggebende Kriterium warum es uns so gut gefallen hat und vor allem ist es nah zum Flughafen und die Mitarbeiter sind alle sehr engagiert.

Gerne wieder...
Preis/ Leistung stimmt hier!
title: Neues und gutes Hotel in Kuta

text:
20年ぶりのバリです！
エクスペディアより、半額セールだったのでかなりお得に予約出来ました。
口コミ通り、出来て間もないようで綺麗だし、朝食もビュッフェが付いていて、またそれも結構美味しくて毎日満足でした！
ベッドメイキングでは毎日バスタオルとタオルを使って動物作ってくれたり、私のサングラスを使ってくれたりとユーモアがとってもありますね！
プールも綺麗だし、海も歩いてすぐなので立地も良かったですよー！
またこちらに来たいと思いました(〃ω〃)
title: 空港から近い綺麗なユーモアあるホテル

text: wir suchten für unseren letzten tag in bali ein einfaches hotel in der nähe des flughafens und sind so auf das sulis beach gestossen. um dort urlaub zu machen würde ich es aufgrund der lage nicht empfehlen. für eine nacht ist es aber ganz ok. kein bijou aber preis/leistung absolut ok
title: günstig und ganz ok

owner_response.text:
Dear "Roberto-ZH"

Many thanks for your overnight transit stay. We understand that not everyone likes the location as night clubs are located quite a distance away. In fact, our regulars who return to stay with us usually go for accommodations away from the hustle & bustle of Kuta but are still within close walking distance to activities (e.g. surfing, beach, restaurants, theaters and shopping mall). In particular, travelling surfers with higher expectation for their quality stay find SULIS BEACH to stand out from other hotels within the same price range.

Despite the above, I was glad to learn that you loved the hotel's price and services.

Best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stiamo alloggiando in questo hotel ancora tutt'ora,personale molto cortese,camere molto grandi,hotel di nuova costruzione,pulizia delle camere e dell'albergo top top,per pulire la camera ci impiegano dai 30 ai 40 minuti,3 minuti a piedi c'è la grande spiaggia di kuta molto grande con piccoli bar dove potete bere e mangiare (spiaggia libera,nessun lettino e ombrellone).
Qualità prezzo eccezionale, solo la colazione lascia un po' desiderare,tante cose salate asiatiche,zuppe,uova,latte e cereali,a mio parere manca un po' di cose dolce,cornetti briosce Nutella,non è da 4 stelle...
title: Ottimo hotel camere grandi

owner_response.text:
Dear "bigmallardon"

Thanks for choosing to stay at Sulis Beach Hotel and taking time to write a feedback. 

While you are still staying there, I'd encourage you to speak to the Restaurant Manager for your breakfast preference. I am sure he would be able to accommodate your request(s) as long as the team is able to make it and it won't increase the breakfast cost.

Please feel free to chat with the Receptionist or any of the management team should you need more information on what the area has to offer. I am usually around the hotel in late afternoon 2 or 3 times a week as I am based at Febri's. Wishing you a pleasant stay and thanks again.

With best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
gm@greenbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Nous sommes rester une semaine dans cet hotel. Globalement nous avons apprécier 

Les + : grande piscine sur le toit vu sur la ville et sur la plage 
La situatuon a coter des commerces et de la plage . A 5min en scooter du centre commercial et du parc aquatique water bomb. 
Petit dej moyen. 

Les - : piscine sur le toit sympa mais aucun parasol !! 
Prendre des boules kies car bruits a partir de 5 6h les clients de l'hôtel et du personnel avec leurs talk walki .. 
Travaux matin et soir de la rue en face .
title: A amélioré

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your stay and we are glad that you enjoyed it.

Shades for sun loungers along swimming pool are in the making process. Hopefully they will be set up in August 2017.

As all our guest rooms are sound-proof, I wonder if the staff' radio communication was heard from your room with your doors shut. Had it been communicated during your stay, we would have rectified immediately.

Should you need any assistance for future booking, please feel free to contact us directly. Thanks again.

Sincerely,

PAUL / General Manager
infor@sulishotelbali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Excellent , hôtel tout neuf ! Service impeccable et pourtant je suis difficile prix super correct!
On est arrivé à la fin de notre voyage à cet hôtel tout près de l'aéroport et îl y a un service de transport jusqu'à l'aéroport gratuitement !
title: Magnifique hôtel ,

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your recent stay and your lovely feedback. Hopefully, we will have the opportunity of hosting you again in near future.

With best regards,

PAUL / General Manager
info@sulishotelspabali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Отдыхали вдвоем с дочерью. Отель выбирали не дорогой и не шумный - попали в яблочко! Отель располагается недалеко от аэропорта на улице Вана Сегара. Чистенький, уютный, спокойный и с отличным обслуживанием. Отель не рассчитан на детей. Завтраки вкусные - за две недели не надоели - можно выбирать из шести разных меню: американский, английский, балийский и т.д. Пляж пустынный - серферов нет. До центра развлечений 20 минут прогулочным шагом  или 10 минут такси (пробки из-за узости улочек). Wi-Fi работает неустойчиво и только у административного корпуса.
title: Green Garden Resort and Spa ***
